original: evaṃ catuḥ ṣaṣṭyaṅgasamanvitāḥ pañca sandhayaḥ pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: evam catuḥ ṣaṣṭi aṅga samanvitāḥ pañca sandhayaḥ pratipāditāḥ
ṣaḍ prayojanāni
gopya artha gopanam
prakāśya artha prakāśanam
abhinaya rāga samṛddhiḥ
iti vṛtta vistaraḥ ca iti
tatra itivṛttam sūcyam asūcyam ca iti dvividham
a sūcyam api dvividham dṛśyam śrāvyam ca

eteṣām svarūpam nirūpyate

atha cūlikā
antar yavanikā saṃsthaiḥ cūlikā arthasya sūcanā

original: yatra nepathyagataiḥ pātrairarthaḥ sūcyate sā cūlikā /

atha aṅka avatāraḥ

a sūcita aṅka pātram tat aṅka avataraṇam matam

original: gṛhītvā praviśet pātraṃ kathoddhāto dvidhaiva saḥ // ViPrud_3.0.29 //

eṣaḥ yam iti upakṣepāt sūtradhāra prayogataḥ

original: vastuno 'nyatra vā yatsyāt dvidhāvalagitaṃ matam // ViPrud_3.0.34 //

stotram prapañcaḥ

atra tu sāmyāt aneka artha yojanam tri gatam

original: eteṣāṃ madhye yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kānicit prastāvanāyāṃ prayoktavyāni /

vīra śṛṅgārayoḥ ekaḥ pradhānam yatra varṇyate

original: nāndyanantaraṃ praviṣṭena sūtradhāreṇa raṅgaprasādhanapuraḥ saraṃ bhāratīvṛttyāśrayaṇena ślokaiḥ kāvyārthaḥ sūcanīyaḥ /

iti

original: śeṣaṃ nāṭakatulyāṅgaṃ bhavet prakaraṇaṃ hi tat // ViPrud_3.0.38 //

original: hāsyo rasaḥ pradhānaṃ syādbhavet prahasanaṃ hi tat // ViPrud_3.0.41 //
analyzed: hāsyaḥ rasaḥ pradhānam syāt bhavet prahasanam hi tat
tat ca trividham śuddham vaikṛtam saṃkīrṇam ca iti

pāṣaṇḍa vipra prabhṛti ceṭī ceṭa samākulam

atha vaikṛtam
kāmuka ādi vacaḥ veṣaiḥ ṣaṇḍa kañcuki tāpasaiḥ

original: yad vīthyaṅgaiḥ samākīrṇaṃ saṃkīrṇaṃ dhūrtasaṃkulam // ViPrud_3.0.44 //

prathame ṅke nibaddhavyā kathā yāma traya avadhiḥ
yāma avadhiḥ dvitīye ṅke tṛtīye ṅke rdha yāmikā

original: asau samavakāraḥ syād vīthyaṅgaiḥ kaiścidanvitaḥ // ViPrud_3.0.53ab //

atha vīthī

atha aṅkaḥ

original: strīṇāṃ vilāso vāgyuddhaṃ netāraḥ prākṛtā narāḥ //
analyzed: strīṇām vilāsaḥ vāc yuddham netāraḥ prākṛtāḥ narāḥ

miśram īhāmṛge vṛttam catur aṅkam tri sandhikam

original: dhīroddhatau striyaṃ divyāṃ hartukāmau ca kāmukau /

bhadrām kautuka vedim āgatavatoḥ anyonyam āseduṣoḥ
śailaiḥ meru himācala prabhṛtibhiḥ devaiḥ hari indra ādibhiḥ

original: asyāṃ vivāhapravṛttayoḥ śivayoḥ varṇanayā sakalanarendraparikarasya pratāparudrasya kākatīyarājyalakṣmīprāptirnāṭakaprayojanarūpā kiṃcidarthaśaktyā  #

āviṣkurvanti murajāḥ sarvatas śabda mādhurīm

etat raṅga prasādhanam
sa praharṣam
bhūbhṛt sutā mahādevau pitarau yasya viśrutau

original: naranāgākṛtiḥ śrīmān sa devaḥ śreyase 'stu vaḥ // ViPrud_3.1.4 //

original: kāvyārthasūcakābhyāṃ ślokābhyāmṛtusamāśraṇena saṃskṛtaprāyanarāśritavāgvyavahārarūpā bhāratī vṛttiḥ kathitā /

original: bho bho madhyamabhuvanabhāgadheyavivartasyaikaśilānagarapuṇyarāśeḥ kākatīyakuladevatāyāḥ svayambhūdevasya satatamahotsavamāsedivāṃso viddhāṃsaḥ

original: yat pratāparudracaritānubandhaḥ prabandhaḥ sāmājikānāṃ manasi vartate /

svabhāva nirargalasya tava bhuja argalayoḥ ojāyitasya kiyatī bhū tala vijaya viḍambanā
parijanaḥ

original: viaalacchīpāṇiggahaṇasamaadiṇṇā via maṅgalakhkhadā juvarāassa sīse dīsaṃdi /
analyzed: viaala chī pāṇiggahaṇa samaa diṇṇā via maṅgala khkhadā juva rāassa sīse

original: ( / vijayalakṣmīpāṇigrahaṇasamayadattā iva maṅgalākṣatā yuvarājasya śīrṣe dṛśyante / )
analyzed: vijaya lakṣmī pāṇigrahaṇa samaya dattāḥ iva maṅgala akṣatāḥ yuvarājasya śīrṣe dṛśyante
vipraḥ rāja putra

original: tattaddigvijayayātrāvārtāhāriṇaḥ puruṣā nāticirādeva preṣaṇīyā iti mahārājasyājñā /
analyzed: tad tad digvijaya yātrā vārtā hāriṇaḥ puruṣāḥ na ati cirāt eva preṣaṇīyāḥ iti mahā rājasya ājñā
pratāparudraḥ śirasi kṛtaḥ tātasya niyogaḥ
amātyān prati
katicana yūyam kākatīśvara sevā artham nivartadhvam
katipaye vijaya yātrā parāḥ pravartadhvam
amātyāḥ sa praṇāmam
yat ājñāpayati yuvarājaḥ

original: vipraḥ---svasti vijayāya śivāḥ panthānaḥ santu rājaputrāya /
analyzed: vipraḥ svasti vijayāya śivāḥ panthānaḥ santu rāja putrāya
pratāparudraḥ sa praśrayam
bhagavan anujānīhi
vayam itas pratiṣṭhāmahe
iti yathocitam parikramya niṣkrāntāḥ sarve
iti vijayayātrāvilāsaḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ ṅkaḥ
atha tṛtīyaḥ ṅkaḥ
tatas praviśataḥ lekha hastau jāṅghikau
etat pūrva aṅka anta pātreṇa vipreṇa nirdiṣṭayoḥ pātrayoḥ uttara aṅke praveśāt aṅkāsyam
prathamaḥ sa anusaṃdhāna āścaryam
aho pratāparudrasya mahima anubhāvaḥ

original: yasya vijayayātrāsaṃbhrameṇaiva vyākulīkṛtāni dvayeṣāmapi bhūbhṛtāṃ kaṭakāni /
analyzed: yasya vijaya yātrā saṃbhrameṇa eva vyākulīkṛtāni dvayeṣām api bhūbhṛtām kaṭakāni
dvitīyaḥ vayasya kim ucyate
kākatīyapradīpaḥ yam aṃśaḥ cāturbhujaḥ svayam
yat vajrakavacāyante prasādāḥ ca svayaṃbhuvaḥ
eṣa svayaṃbhū deva prasāda rūpasya bījasya anveṣaṇāt garbha sandhiḥ
prathamaḥ adhva klamam abhinīya puras valokya
prāptā iyam andhra nagarī
kiṃcid praveśa nāṭitakena samantataḥ nirūpya aho
niratiśayam audāryam rudra nareśvarasya

original: yadete vaitālikāḥ sarvāto bhogāvalīpramukhāṃścāṭuprabandhānuccaiḥ paṭhantaḥ svabhāvaramaṇīyāḥ pratiraveṇa pāṭhayanti ca kakubhaḥ /
analyzed: yat ete vaitālikāḥ sarvātas bhoga āvalī pramukhān cāṭu prabandhān uccais paṭhantaḥ svabhāva ramaṇīyāḥ pratiraveṇa pāṭhayanti ca kakubhaḥ
dvitīyaḥ samyak nirvaṇya sa pratyabhijñā āścaryam apavārya sakhe
paśya paśya
samyak māgadha veṣa dhāraṇa tirobhūtāḥ api kṣamābhujaḥ
sūcyante prabhu tā rahasya piśunaiḥ āviṣkṛtaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ
hasta agraiḥ dhvaja cakra lāñchina talaiḥ vakṣaḥ sthalaiḥ vistṛtaiḥ
ākāra rai manuṣya mātra sulabhaiḥ vṛttaiḥ anīcaiḥ api

original: prathamaḥ---nūnamete pratāparudrasamaraparāṅmukhā vakṣaḥ sthalaviracitavarāhalakṣmāṇaḥ prāṇatrāṇārthamanayā rītyā kākatīyamahārājaṃ prasādayitumadhyavasyantīti  #
analyzed: prathamaḥ nūnam ete pratāparudra samara parāṅmukhāḥ vakṣaḥ sthala viracita varāha lakṣmāṇaḥ prāṇa trāṇa artham anayā rītyā kākatīya mahā rājam prasādayitum adhyavasyanti iti
tarkayāmi
etat prastuta upayogi pratirāja chadma ācaraṇāt abhūta āharaṇam
jāṅghikena punar taiḥ taiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ nareśvara abhyūhanāt anumānam ca
dvitīyaḥ aho
vijaya yātrā śravaṇa kutūhali tā paurāṇām
yadā āvām anusaranti punar punar praśrama ālayā
tat sakhe prakāśyatām pratāparudrasya bhujayoḥ vijaya udāharaṇam
prathamaḥ kiṃcid uccais bho bhoḥ
śrūyatām kākatīya kula ślāghā kāmadhenuḥ priyodantaḥ
jetrā kākati vīra rudra vibhunā sarvāḥ diśaḥ nirjitāḥ
kṣmāpālāḥ karadīkṛtāḥ kṛtam idam nirvīram urvī talam
yasya udyat bhuja vaibhavam sarabhasa ārohat dviṣat kāminī
mañjīra dhvani pūrṇa kandara mukhaiḥ vyākurvate parvatāḥ
eṣa tattva anukīrtana rūpaḥ mārgaḥ
dvitīyaḥsakhe

original: nūnameṣu divaseṣu kākatīyamahārājo nirantaraṃ puraskṛtapurodhaḥ pravarāmātyavṛddho yuvarājavijayamāśaṃsamāno gamayati vāsarāṇi /
analyzed: nūnam eṣu divaseṣu kākatīya mahā rājaḥ nirantaram puraskṛta purodhaḥ pravara amātya vṛddhaḥ yuvarāja vijayam āśaṃsamānaḥ gamayati vāsarāṇi
prathamaḥ ucitam anucintitam vayasyena
dvitīyaḥ puras valokya sa harṣam

original: kathamasmadīyaṃ vacanamākarṇya nūnaṃ mahārājāya nivedayitumamātyaputraḥ saharṣasaṃbhramaṃ rājakulābhyantaraṃ praviśati /
analyzed: katham asmadīyam vacanam ākarṇya nūnam mahā rājāya nivedayitum amātya putraḥ sa harṣa saṃbhramam rāja kula abhyantaram praviśati
tadā āvām api pratīhāra bhūmim adhyāsya kākatīśvara avasaram pratipālayiṣyāvaḥ iti
parikrāmataḥ
etat vitarka pratipādanāt rūpam
tatas praviśati amātya putraḥ
amātya putraḥ sa pramodam
aho mama dhanya tā
yadi īdṛśānām mahā utsavānām nivedayitāsmi saṃvṛttaḥ

original: yanmayā vijñāpitaiḥ śravaṇapriyaṃkaraṇairvārtāmṛtaiḥ svapnasākṣātkṛtādapi svayaṃbhūdevaprasādāt pramodayiṣyate kākatīyavṛṣā /
analyzed: yat mayā vijñāpitaiḥ śravaṇa priyaṃkaraṇaiḥ vārttā amṛtaiḥ svapna sākṣātkṛtāt api svayaṃbhū deva prasādāt pramodayiṣyate kākatīya vṛṣā
eṣā utkarṣa vacana rūpā udāhṛtiḥ
puraḥ valokya

original: kathamayaṃ mahārājaḥ purohitairamātyairanyena parijanena ca parivṛto mahāsthānamaṇṭapamadhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: katham ayam mahā rājaḥ purohitaiḥ amātyaiḥ anyena parijanena ca parivṛtaḥ mahā sthāna maṇṭapam adhitiṣṭhati
tat aham upasarpāmi
iti parikrāmati
tatas praviśati yathānirdiṣṭaḥ rājā
mantriṇaḥ ca purodhasaḥ ca
rājā a sa vimarśa āścaryam amātyān prati
aho śaiśave pi ucita kāri tvam vatsasya vīrarudrasya
yat asmad anurodha artham imān amātyān nivartya svayam eva jigīṣuḥ prasthitaḥ
mantriṇaḥ sa bahu mānam mahā rāja
bhavatā khalu pitṛmān kumāraḥ
purodhasaḥ vijayaprasthānāt prabhṛti naktaṃdivam unmiṣanti kalyāṇāni
tad vijitāḥ eva diśaḥ rāja putreṇa
rājā abhavatām āśiṣaḥ eva kākatīya kula śreyāṃsi svayam praduhate
parijanaḥ

original: kāaīakulassa kiṃ ṇu ṇa saṃpuṇṇaṃ puṇṇeṇa,
analyzed: kāaīa kulassa kim ṇu ṇa saṃpuṇṇam puṇṇeṇa
jassim avaiṇṇaḥ bhuvaṇekkabhaddo

sarve sa harṣa atiśayam nirūpayanti

śīghram praveśaya
amātya putraḥ yat ādiśanti mahā mantriṇaḥ
iti niṣkramya saha tābhyām punar praviṣṭaḥ
puruṣau praṇamantau upasṛtya deva
viśva eka vijayinā putreṇa vardhase
bāḍham aprameya mahimā pratāpa rudra bhuja sthemā
yat śaiśave pi atiśayita taruṇa kākatīya parākramaḥ tasya vikramaḥ
rājā a sa harṣa atiśayam amātyān avalokya
manorathābhyām iva cintita upagatābhyām mahārgham pāritoṣikam pratipādyatām
dvi guṇīkṛta harṣayoḥ anayoḥ mukhāt vatsasya vijaya lakṣmī parigraha vṛttānta śravaṇa mahā utsavena caritā arthayāmaḥ śrotra vṛttim
mantriṇaḥ yat ājñāpayati devaḥ
iti bhaurika mukhāt tathā kurvanti
eṣa sāma dāna ācaraṇa rūpaḥ saṃgrahaḥ
puruṣau sa praṇāmam gṛhītvā mūrdhni nidhāya mahā rāja prasādam abhinandataḥ

original: mantriṇaḥ---bhadrāvita etya yuvarājavijayavihṛtayaḥ parākramapallavitā mahārājasadasaḥ karṇapūrīkriyantām /
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ bhadrāvitaḥ etya yuvarāja vijaya vihṛtayaḥ parākrama pallavitāḥ mahā rāja sadasaḥ karṇapūrīkriyantām
puruṣausāvadhānam avadhārayatu mahā rājaḥ
prathamaḥdeva

original: devasya prasādena vājinīrājanāsamidhyamānasya vītihotrasya vijayapradānena dviguṇitodagrapratāpe pratāparudre pratiṣṭhāmāne,
analyzed: devasya prasādena vājinī rājanā samidhyamānasya vītihotrasya vijaya pradānena dvi guṇita udagra pratāpe pratāparudre pratiṣṭhā māne
yātrā ārambha maheṣu ahaṃprathamikā niryat camū ḍambara
kṣuṇṇa kṣoṇi tala utthite ti bahule pāṃsau viyat vyāpini
jetavyāḥ sakalāḥ diśaḥ sva vibhu tām antar pidhāya adhika

original: trāsāt kvāpi palāyitā iva dṛśāṃ naivābhavan gocarāḥ // ViPrud_3.3.4 //
analyzed: trāsāt kvāpi palāyitāḥ iva dṛśām nā eva abhavan gocarāḥ
anantaram ca
udvellat caturarṇavī kalakalaḥ na ayam camū ḍambaraḥ
na idam dundubhi garjitam tripurajit kalpānta ḍhakkāravaḥ
iti āṭopa paṭīyasīṣu paritas dhāṭīṣu bhāra anama
ccheṣa aśeṣa phaṇāsu vismitam atha trastam digīśaiḥ api
purodhasaḥ aho niraṅkuśa mojāyita mandhra camūpatīnām

original: dvitīyaḥ---atha yuvarājājñayā prathamaṃ māghavanīṃ diśaṃ pracalitāni sainyāni /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ atha yuvarāja ājñayā prathamam māghavanīm diśam pracalitāni sainyāni
rathena abhimukhyātam vīra rudraḥ vilokya mām
mṛṣyate na ayam iti arkaḥ sainya reṇau tirohitaḥ
mantriṇaḥ tatas tatas

original: dvitīyaḥ---anantaraṃ senāgragaireva paurastyān kṣudrakṣatriyānnirjitya sarvapathīnenāṭopena paṭīyasi tasmin mahati bale pracalati,
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ anantaram senā agragaiḥ eva paurastyān kṣudra kṣatriyān nirjitya sarva pathīnena āṭopena paṭīyasi tasmin mahati bale pracalati
yuddhāya samanahyanta kaliṅgāḥ sphuṭa pauruṣāḥ
mādyat dvipa ghaṭa uddāma saṃbhrama āḍambara uddhatāḥ
taiḥ sārdha mandhra camū patīnām parākrama dhane mahati āyodhane
pītvā māṃsa upadaṃśam dvirada gala galat raktamaireya dhārām
mattaḥ mastiṣka lagnaiḥ dalita nṛpa vapuḥ kīkasaiḥ sṛṣṭa daṃṣṭraḥ
bibhrat raudra antra mālām janita jana bhayaḥ bhairava ākāra ghoraḥ
saṃgrāma urvyāḥ kaliṅgaiḥ bali vidhim akarot vīrarudrasya khaṅgaḥ
purodhasaḥ mānuṣa veṣa tirohitena api kākatīya viṣṇunā kiṃcid āviṣkṛtaḥ nija prabhāvaḥ
mantriṇaḥ sa harṣa atiśaya adbhutam
aho parākrama ati bhūmiḥ pratāparudrasya
parijanaḥ
sarisam khu ā idam

jam khamam

yat kākati kula prasavānām kṣamam
yat kuladevatāyāḥ svayaṃbhū devasya prasatti viśeṣāṇām yuktam
tat khalu kṛtam yuvarājena
tatas tatas
prathamaḥ anantaram
chinna udyat vairi vīra pratibhaya mukuṭa āṭopa saṃjāta rāhu
bhrānti bhraśyat pataṅga abhaya kara pṛtanā reṇu baddha andhakārā

pārepūrva payodhi kalpita jaya stambhāḥ sphurat tejasaḥ

original: śṛṇvanto muhurandhrasainyapatayaḥ prāptā diśaṃ dakṣiṇām // ViPrud_3.3.10 //
analyzed: śṛṇvantaḥ muhur andhra sainya patayaḥ prāptāḥ diśam dakṣiṇām
tatra ca
munau lopāmudrā suhṛdi nikaṭa sthe mahatā
bhavanti etāḥ nadyaḥ kaluṣa payasaḥ sainya rajasā
iti iva vyoma agre kalaya pavana āndolita śikhāḥ
patākāḥ sa utprāsāḥ pratipadam anṛtyan atitarām

original: anantaraṃ pāṇḍyapramukhān dākṣiṇātyān kṣitīśvarān śaraṇamupagatān kākatīyavīrarudraḥ svacamūpatinirviśeṣaṃ saṃbhāvya taiḥ saha pratīcīṃ diśaṃ  #
analyzed: anantaram pāṇḍya pramukhān dākṣiṇātyān kṣitīśvarān śaraṇam upagatān kākatīya vīra rudraḥ sva camūpati nirviśeṣam saṃbhāvya taiḥ saha pratīcīm diśam
pracalitaḥ

original: mantriṇaḥ---sādhu sādhu samācaritamātmanīnaṃ pāṇḍyairyat pūrvameva devasya caraṇamūlaṃ prāptāḥ /
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ sādhu sādhu samācaritam ātmanīnam pāṇḍyaiḥ yat pūrvam eva devasya caraṇa mūlam prāptāḥ
tatas tatas
dvitīyaḥ tatra ca
pāścāttyānām dhvajeṣu sthitam adhika bhara srasta daṇḍeṣu gṛdhra
vrātaiḥ yat caṇḍa tuṇḍa āhati vihata paṭeṣu āhata kṣipta pakṣaiḥ
astram gārutmatam tat samajani vijaya prārthinām andhra sainya
praṣṭhānām janyam anyat nija nibiḍa bhujā daṇḍa kaṇḍū viḍambaḥ
anantaram
jitvā pratīcīm atha vīrarudraḥ pratyarthi nārī nayana ambu pūrṇām

original: revāṃ samuttīrya gajānubaddhasetuṃ vijetuṃ gatavānudīcīm // ViPrud_3.3.13 //
analyzed: revām samuttīrya gaja anubaddha setum vijetum gatavān udīcīm

original: tatrāṅgavaṅgakaliṅgamālavaprabhṛtayaḥ sarve bhūpālā militvā yuddhāya baddhādarāḥ purataḥ prādurabhavan /
analyzed: tatra aṅga vaṅga kaliṅga mālava prabhṛtayaḥ sarve bhūpālāḥ militvā yuddhāya baddha ādarāḥ puratas prādurabhavan
mantriṇaḥ aho param anātma vedita udīcyānām yat pratāparudrasya api paripanthinaḥ bhavanti
rājā atatas tatas

original: prathamaḥ---anantaraṃ samamanīkinībhirāpatantībhiḥ rājakāni vilokya sagarvamevamuktaṃ senāpatibhiḥ---
analyzed: prathamaḥ anantaram samam anīkinībhiḥ āpatantībhiḥ rājakāni vilokya sa garvam evam uktam senāpatibhiḥ

original: re re ghūrjara jarjaro 'si samare lampāka /
analyzed: re re ghūrjara jarjaraḥ si samare lampāka
kim kampase

original: vaṅga / tvaṅgasi kiṃ mudhā balarajaḥ kāṇo 'si kiṃ koṅkaṇa / /

kim kathyate
sainikānām nirupamaḥ parākramaḥ
yaḥ tatra abhavat āhavaḥ tam akhilam jānāti bhāgīrathī
yā atyākṣīt sura bhūya kāraṇa nija ahaṃkāram ucchṛṅkhalam
ārāt vīkṣya samagra mandhra su bhaṭa prodghūrṇa khaḍraga āvalī

original: anantaraṃ tatra tatra pralīnātmanaḥ pratipakṣamūlānanveṣṭukāmāstriliṅgasainikāstattaddeśaveṣabhāṣādikamāviṣkurvāṇāḥ sarvataḥ paryaṭanti sma

mantriṇaḥ sādhīyān khalu sainikānām udyamaḥ
etat prakṛta upayogi tvena vañcanāt adhibalam
rājā atatas tatas

original: dvitīyaḥ---anantaraṃ narapatayo nijaparijaneṣvapyakṛtaviśvāsāḥ pratāparudrasya pādamūlameva śaraṇamupagatāḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ anantaram narapatayaḥ nija parijaneṣu api akṛta viśvāsāḥ pratāparudrasya pāda mūlam eva śaraṇam upagatāḥ
parijanaḥ
aho ṇara variṇam

original: viṣṇorvīkṣya mahābhiṣevanavidhiṃ nandanti sarve janāḥ // ViPrud_3.5.1 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ vīkṣya mahā abhiṣevana vidhim nandanti sarve janāḥ
eṣa svayaṃbhū deva upadeśa nareśvara vijaya pramukha mukha saṃdhyā ādi bīja nānā arthānām mahā prayojanībhūta mahā abhiṣeka artha tayā yojanāt nirvahaṇa saṃdhiḥ
sa ullāsam nūnam idānīm
svapne pyā sūtritām ājñām pālayantam kula udvaham
na mānti antar mudaḥ śaṃbhoḥ vibhoḥ api abhinandataḥ

original: eṣa mukhasaṃdhau prasiddhasya svapnopadeśarūpasya bījasyopagamāt saṃdhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa mukha saṃdhau prasiddhasya svapna upadeśa rūpasya bījasya upagamāt saṃdhiḥ
kiṃcid uccais
śreyaḥ prasrava nirbharāḥ dvi januṣām āśīḥ giraḥ jāgrati

original: ārūḍhā padamunnataṃ grahagaṇāḥ śreyān muhūrtaḥ śubhaiḥ
analyzed: ārūḍhā padam unnatam graha gaṇāḥ śreyān muhūrtaḥ śubhaiḥ
nakṣatrāṇi śivaṃkarāṇi śubha dāḥ ca anye nimitta udayāḥ

iti parikrāmanti

parijanaḥ śrutvā

parijayaḥ vilokya sa āmoda kautukam

original: a puvvapavvaakaṇaasāṇuṃ sahassarassī via sumerukaṇaataḍaṃ mahendro via pakhkhivakkavaṭṭiṇaṃ cakkadharo via kaṇaavediṃ ārūḍho paāvaruddo /
analyzed: a puvva pavvaa kaṇaa sāṇum sahassa rassī via sumeru kaṇaa taḍam mahendraḥ via pakhkhi vakka vaṭṭiṇam cakkadharaḥ via kaṇaa vedim ārūḍhaḥ paāvaruddhaḥ
a pūrva parvata kanaka sānum sahasra raśima reva

original: amī purodhaso mahābhiṣekāya tīrthasalilapūrṇān kanakakalaśān dhārayanti /
analyzed: amī purodhasaḥ mahā abhiṣekāya tīrtha salila pūrṇān kanaka kalaśān dhārayanti

prajā anurañjanaiḥ kṣoṇīm pālaya ācandratārakam

svayaṃbhū deva pramoda aṭṭahāsa upabṛṃhitam kākatīya kula śreyaḥ prastāvanā ḍiṇḍimam cira avalambita dharaṇī bhāra khinnānām
phaṇipati prabhṛtīnām praharṣa kṣveḍā viḍambitam dharma pratiṣṭhā maṅgala kāhalī kolāhala manoharam

priya cintā madirayā paravaśā paśyata śyāma aṅgī
atha śramaḥ
śramaḥ khedaḥ dhvarati ādeḥ jātaḥ sveda ati bhūmi kṛt
yathā

original: āacchai evva pie kīsa kareṃtī gaāgaāāsaṃ /
analyzed: evva pie kīsa kareṃtī
suṃdari
āgacchati eva priye kasmāt kurvatī gata āgata āyāsam
tāmyasi sveda jalaiḥ sundari lulita aṅgarāgā asi
atha ālasyam
manda udyama tvam ālasyam kartavyeṣu prakīrtyate
yathā
āstām mṛga akṣyāḥ gṛha kṛtya vārtā sva aṅga upacāreṣu api yatna māndyam

original: kartavyamagre dayitasya yat syānnūnaṃ balātkārayati smarastat // ViPrud_4.42 //
analyzed: kartavyam agre dayitasya yat syāt nūnam balāt kārayati smaraḥ tat
atha dainyam
sattva tyāgāt anauddhatyam dainyam kārpaṇya saṃbhavam
yathā

original: āṇeduṃ ṇaraṇāhaṃ gado kkhu sahījaṇo vilaṃbei /
analyzed: āṇedum ṇaraṇāham gadaḥ kkhu sahī jaṇaḥ vilaṃbei

original: mammaha ṇamāmi caṃdaṃ sikkhaa cireha īsi tti // ViPrud_4.43 //
analyzed: mammaha ṇamāmi caṃdam tti
ānetum naranātham gataḥ khalu sakhī janaḥ vilambate

original: manmatha namāmi candraṃ śikṣaya ciraya īṣaditi //)
analyzed: manmatha namāmi candram śikṣaya cirayaḥ īṣat iti
atha cintā
iṣṭa anabhigamāt dhyānam cintā śūnyatva tāpa kṛt
yathā

original: asaṇṇihiaṃ vi guruaṇaṃ ṇa a pekhkhai pucchiā vi ṇaāḷavai /
analyzed: a saṇṇihiam vi guruaṇam ṇa a pekhkhai pucchiā vi

original: esā vi maggai gaiṃ hiaassa piāṇubaṃdhassa // ViPrud_4.45 //
analyzed: esā vi maggai gaim hiaassa piāṇu baṃdhassa

original: (asaṃnihitamapi gurujanaṃ na ca prekṣate pṛṣṭāpi nālapati /
analyzed: asaṃnihitam api guru janam na ca prekṣate pṛṣṭā api na ālapati
eṣā api mārgate gatim hṛdayasya priya anubandhasya
atha mohaḥ
mohaḥ tu mūrcchanam bhīti duḥ kha āveśa anucintanaiḥ
yathā
katham api gamayitvā vāsaram dīrgha dīrgham
viracita nava veṣā preṣayitvā atha dūtīḥ
cirayati hṛdayeśe prāṃśubhiḥ candra pādaiḥ
abhihata sakala aṅgī mūrcchitā komala aṅgī
atha smṛtiḥ
pūrva anubhūta viṣayam jñānam smṛtiḥ udāhṛtā
yathā

original: pratāparudrasya bhuje vasantyā kṣoṇyātapaḥ kīdṛśamārjitaṃ syāt /
analyzed: pratāparudrasya bhuje vasantyā kṣoṇyā ātapaḥ kīdṛśam ārjitam syāt

original: spṛṣṭaṃ sakṛd yena madīyamaṅgaṃ prāpnoti viṣvak sukhavajralepam // ViPrud_4.48 //
analyzed: spṛṣṭam sakṛt yena madīyam aṅgam prāpnoti viṣvak sukha vajra lepam
atha dhṛtiḥ
dhṛtiḥ cittasya naisspṛhyam jñāna abhīṣṭa āgama ādibhiḥ
yathā
vīra rudra nṛpatau hṛdaya
tvad vallabhe tribhuvana eka dhurīṇe

original: sādhu sādhu kṛtakṛtyamasi tvaṃ manyase jagadaśeṣamasāram // ViPrud_4.49 //
analyzed: sādhu sādhu kṛtakṛtyam asi tvam manyase jagat aśeṣam asāram
atha vrīḍā
cetaḥ saṃkocanam vrīḍā anaṅga rāga stava ādibhiḥ
yathā
tathā samālokana kautukānām manorathaiḥ andhra pura aṅganānām

original: vilokite rudranṛpe bhavanti paryastapakṣmāṇi vilocanāni // ViPrud_4.51 //
analyzed: vilokite rudra nṛpe bhavanti paryasta pakṣmāṇi vilocanāni
atha capala tā
cāpalam tu anavasthānam rāga dveṣa ādi saṃbhavam
yathā
dṛṣṭvā rudra narendram taralatara akṣī vilāsa mṛdu hāsā

original: kalayati mauktimahāraṃ spṛśati ca karṇotpalaṃ bālā // ViPrud_4.52 //
analyzed: kalayati mauktima hāram spṛśati ca karṇa utpalam bālā
atha harṣaḥ
prasattiḥ utsava ādibhyaḥ harṣaḥ sveda aśru kampa kṛt
yathā

original: yat pūrvaṃ sarasīṣu padmamukulavyājāt tapaḥ saṃcitaṃ
analyzed: yat pūrvam sarasīṣu padma mukula vyājāt tapaḥ saṃcitam

original: vakṣojau yuvayostadadya phalitaṃ jātau kṛtārthau yuvām /
analyzed: vakṣojau yuvayoḥ tat adya phalitam jātau kṛtārthau yuvām
dattā kākati vallabhena bhavatoḥ eṣā sva vakṣaḥ sthalī
kastūrī dviguṇa bhavat parimalā kalhāra mālā yatas
atha āvegaḥ
iṣṭa aniṣṭa āgamān jātaḥ āvegaḥ citta saṃbhramaḥ
yathā
nissāṇa dhvanim ākalayya sahasā helā vihāra udyatam
draṣṭum kākati vīra rudra nṛpatim pratyagra kautūhalāḥ
ardha ālambita maṇḍanāḥ pratipadam vyatyasta bhūṣāḥ javāt
ārohanti suvarṇa saudha valabhī śṛṅgāṇi paura striyaḥ
atha jaḍa tā
jāḍyam apratipattiḥ syāt iṣṭa aniṣṭa āgama udbhavā
yathā
samāyāte nāthe pramahasi gṛhān rudra nṛpatau
vapuḥ saundarya śrī vijita madana udāra yaśasi
vadhūḥ antar toṣa vyatikara vaśāt na upacaritum

original: purastādālīnāṃ na calati tathā no viramati // ViPrud_4.57 //
analyzed: purastāt ālīnām na calati tathā no viramati
atha garvaḥ
yathā
kaḥ vā śastra grahaṇa samayaḥ mādṛśām īdṛśānām
kīdṛś vairam prati dharaṇi bhṛt kheṭa kīṭeṣu amīṣu
iti āveśa pratibhaya bhuja āṭopa durvāra garvāḥ

original: saṃkrīḍante raṇabhuvi bhaṭāḥ kākatīndrasya jetuḥ // ViPrud_4.58 //
analyzed: saṃkrīḍante raṇa bhuvi bhaṭāḥ kākati indrasya jetuḥ
atha viṣādaḥ
viṣādaḥ cetasaḥ bhaṅgaḥ upāya apāya cintanaiḥ
yathā

original: pesemi maṇa tti muhā taṃ maṃ mokkhūṇa vallahe laggaṃ /
analyzed: pesemi maṇa tti muhā tam mam mokkhūṇa vallahe laggam

original: maṃ ujjhia ṇo gacchai maaṇo sahi kiṃ ṇu kādavvaṃ // ViPrud_4.60 //
analyzed: mam ujjhia no gacchai maaṇaḥ sahi kim ṇu kādavvam

original: (preṣayāmi mana iti mudhā tanmāṃ muktvā vallabhe lagnam /
analyzed: preṣayāmi manaḥ iti mudhā tat mām muktvā vallabhe lagnam

original: māmujjhitvā no gacchati madanaḥ sakhi kiṃ nu kartavyam //)
analyzed: mām ujjhitvā naḥ gacchati madanaḥ sakhi kim nu kartavyam
atha autsukyam
kāla akṣama tvam autsukyam manaḥ tāpa tvarā ādi kṛt
yathā
aṃgāi pasāhiūṇa tuvaraṃtaḥ
ruddaṇa reṃdā gamaṇe vilaṃbiam sahai kiccheṇa
aandhra pura bhāminī janaḥ ṅgāni prasādhya tvaramāṇaḥ
rudra narendra āgamane vilambitam sahate kṛcchreṇa
atha nidrā
yathā

original: siviṇe diṭṭhaṃ daiaṃ vahuā āliṅgiduṃ kidojjoā /
analyzed: siviṇe diṭṭham daiam vahuā āliṅgidum kida ujjoā

original: uvaha daramīliacchī gaaṇammi kare pasārei // ViPrud_4.62 //
analyzed: gaaṇammi kare pasārei
svapne dṛṣṭam dayitam vadhūḥ āliṅgitum kṛta udyogā
paśyata dara mīlita akṣī gagane karau prasārayati
atha apasmāraḥ
āveśaḥ moha duḥ kha ādyaiḥ apasmāraḥ ṅga tāpa kṛt
yathā
dṛṣṭvā svapne kupita vadanam kākatīya kṣitīndram
hā hā rakṣa iti a sakala giraḥ saṃbhrama utthāna bhājaḥ
dhāvanti antar varṇa bhuvi luṭhanti āhvayanti ātmabandhūn
ārāt bhūtān api ripu gaṇāḥ vyasta nāmagraheṇa
atha suptiḥ
suptiḥ nidrā samudrekaḥ
yathā
viśva eka rakṣā juṣi kākati indre niścinta tām prāptavataḥ murāreḥ
tad kīrtti candra ātapa vardhitaḥ dugdha ambudhiḥ nā eva bhinatti nidrām
atha vibodhaḥ
vibodhaḥ cetanā avāptiḥ jṛmbhā akṣi parimārga kṛt
yathā
pratāparudre nṛpa mauli ratne viśvaṃbharām rakṣati śikṣitārau
vijṛmbhamāṇāḥ paritas prajānām bhāgya śriyaḥ tad kṣaṇam unmiṣanti
atha amarṣaḥ

original: amarṣaḥ sāparādheṣu cetaḥ prajvalanaṃ matam // ViPrud_4.67 //
analyzed: amarṣaḥ sa aparādheṣu cetaḥ prajvalanam matam

are bhūpāḥ cāpān namayata śirāṃsi unnamayata
pravṛttāḥ sva strīṇām ahamahamikāḥ vīra varaṇe
tvarante naḥ khaṅgāḥ pravidalana kelyām iti bhaṭā
raṇa agre garjanti prakaṭita ruṣaḥ rudra nṛpateḥ
atha avahitthā
harṣa ādi ākāra saṃguptiḥ avahitthā iti kathyate
yathā
goṭṭhīe mahilāṇam soūṇa

original: ālihai oṇaamuhī muddhā calaṇeṇa mahipaṭṭhaṃ // ViPrud_4.69 //
analyzed: ālihai oṇa amuhī calaṇeṇa mahi paṭṭham
goṣṭhyām mahilānām śrutvā pratāparudra caritāni
ālikhati avanata mukhī mugdhā caraṇena mahī pṛṣṭam
atha ugra tā
dṛṣṭe parādhe caṇḍa tvam ugra tā tarjana ādi kṛt
yathā
priyam ānīya māninyā viraha ārtiḥ nivāryatām
yat etasyāḥ kaṭākṣa ulkā pātaiḥ induḥ maṣīkṛtaḥ
atha matiḥ
tattva mārga anusaṃdhānāt artha nirdhāraṇam matiḥ
yathā

original: ko saṃsao mahialaṃ caṃdo evva vīraruddaṇaraṇāho /
analyzed: kaḥ saṃsaaḥ mahi alam cando evva
jassa khu kara ppassādaḥ aṃgāi miaṃkaraaṇam ti
kaḥ saṃśayaḥ mahī tale candraḥ eva vīra rudra nara nāthaḥ
yasya khalu
kara sparśāt aṅgāni
atha vyādhiḥ
manaḥ tāpa ādi abhibhavāt jvara ādiḥ vyādhiḥ iṣyate
yathā
pratāparudrasya diśām jigīṣoḥ pratyarthi nārī jana deha janmā
smara jvara ūṣmā himavat pradeśān smartavya nīhāra kathān karoti
atha unmādaḥ
unmādaḥ tulya varti tvam cetana acetaneṣu api
yathā
pratāparudrasya jaya prayāṇa bherī dhvanau mūrcchati diṅmukheṣu

original: trāsākulā bhrāntimupetya vṛkṣān pṛcchanti mārgaṃ ripubhūmipālāḥ // ViPrud_4.75 //
analyzed: trāsa ākulāḥ bhrāntim upetya vṛkṣān pṛcchanti mārgam ripu bhūmipālāḥ
atha maraṇam
maraṇam maraṇa arthaḥ tu prayatnaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
yathā
pia viraham a sahaṃtī vahuā ṇia jīviam uvekkhaṃtī

original: sevvai johṇaṃ dakhkhiṇapavaṇassa taṇuṃ samappei // ViPrud_4.77 //
analyzed: sevvai johṇam dakhkhiṇa pavaṇassa taṇum samappei
priya viraham asahamānā vadhūḥ nija jīvitam upekṣamāṇā
sevate jyotsnām dakṣiṇa pavanasya tanum samarpayati
sākṣāt maraṇasya amaṅgala tvāt na udāharaṇa tvam ucitam
atha trāsaḥ
ākasmika bhayāt citta kṣobhaḥ trāsaḥ prakīrtyate

original: apaṇaakuviā cireṇa vi vahuā soūṇa ghaṇaghaṇatthaṇiaṃ /
analyzed: cireṇa vi vahuā soūṇa ghaṇa ghaṇa tthaṇiam
āliṅgai
a praṇaya kupitā cireṇa api vadhūḥ śrutvā ghana ghana stanitam
dayitam sarabhasa valitā āliṅgati vepamāna aṅgī
atha vitarkaḥ
saṃdehāt kalpanā ānantyam vitarkaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
yathā
guṇaiḥ tatra āsaktam mama hṛdayam anyat na gaṇitam
sakhībhiḥ nā aloci kṣitipatiḥ asau durlabhaḥ iti

original: upāyaḥ ko vā syāt tadabhigamane muhyati manaḥ
analyzed: upāyaḥ kaḥ vā syāt tad abhigamane muhyati manaḥ
kiyān kaḥ yam kīdṛś kiyat avadhiḥ antar vyatikaraḥ

original: tatra sāttvikānāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ cānekarasasādhāraṇatvānna viśeṣamapekṣyodāharaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tatra sāttvikānām vyabhicāriṇām ca aneka rasa sādhāraṇa tvāt na viśeṣam apekṣya udāharaṇam kṛtam
tathā hi śṛhgāre sarveṣām anupraveśaḥ saṃbhavati
hāsye glāni śrama capala tva harṣa avahitthānām saṃbhavaḥ
karuṇe mada dhṛti vrīḍā harṣa garva autsukya ugra tābhiḥ vinā anye saṃbhavanti
raudre glāni śaṅkā ālasya dainya cintā vrīḍā vega jaḍa tā viṣāda supti nidrā apasmāra avahitthā vyādhi unmāda śama trāsāḥ na saṃbhavanti
vīre raudrāt nirvedaḥ dhikaḥ
bhayānake sūyā mada dhṛti vrīḍā harṣa garva nidrā supti amarṣa avahittha ugra tā matibhiḥ vinā anye saṃbhavanti
bībhatse dbhute ca cintā trāsa ādayaḥ yathāsaṃbhavam ūhyāḥ
śānte nirveda dhṛtī saṃbhavataḥ
śṛṅgāra ceṣṭāḥ
śṛṅgāra ceṣṭāḥ nirūpyante

original: bhāvo hāvaśca helā ca mādhuryaṃ dhairyamityapi /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ hāvaḥ ca helā ca mādhuryam dhairyam iti api
moṭṭāyitam kuṭṭamitam bibbokaḥ lalitam tathā

original: kutūhalaṃ ca cakitaṃ vihṛtaṃ hāsa ityapi // ViPrud_4.82 //
analyzed: kutūhalam ca cakitam vihṛtam hāsaḥ iti api
evam śṛṅgāra ceṣṭāḥ syuḥ aṣṭādaśavidhāḥ matāḥ
tatra āsām svarūpam udāharaṇam ca
bhāvaḥ
rasa abhijñāna yogya tvam bhāvaḥ iti abhidhīyate
yathā
rudda nareṃdasya guṇe gāai bāla ttaṇammi vissaddham

original: lajjai darapulaio juvaijaṇo jovvaṇe gāuṃ // ViPrud_4.84 //
analyzed: lajjai dara pulaiaḥ juvai jaṇaḥ gāum
rudra narendrasya guṇān gāyati bāla tve visrabdham
lajjate dara pulakitaḥ yuvati janaḥ yauvane gātum
atha hāvaḥ
īṣat dṛṣṭa vikāraḥ syāt bhāvaḥ hāvaḥ prakīrtyate
yathā
atra eva īṣat pulakitaḥ iti
atha helā
su vyakta vikriyaḥ bhāvaḥ helā iti pratipādyate
yathā

original: mā hodu kassa vi phphuḍaṃ ia muddhe kuṇasi vallahaṃ hiae /
analyzed: mā hodu kassa vi phphuḍam ia muddhe kuṇasi vallaham hiae

original: ghosijjai tuha bhāo savvaṃgīṇehi pulaehiṃ // ViPrud_4.86 //
analyzed: tuha bhāo savvaṃgīṇehiṃ pulaehiṃ

original: (mā bhavatu kasyāpi sphuṭamiti mugdhe karoṣi vallabhaṃ hṛdaye /
analyzed: mā bhavatu kasya api sphuṭam iti mugdhe karoṣi vallabham hṛdaye
ghoṣyate tava bhāvaḥ sarvāṅgīṇaiḥ pulakaiḥ
atha mādhuryam
ramya tvam mādhuryam iti kathyate
yathā
jita trailokya lāvaṇyā prakṛtyā hariṇa īkṣaṇā

original: kiṃ tu bhūṣayituṃ dhatte bhūṣaṇānīti me matiḥ // ViPrud_4.87 //
analyzed: kim tu bhūṣayitum dhatte bhūṣaṇāni iti me matiḥ
atha dhairyam
śīla ādya laṅghanam nāma dhairyam iti abhidhīyate
yathā

original: akulavahuāṇaṃ ṇa jujjai majjāālaṃghaṇaṃ khu visame vi /
analyzed: a kula vahuāṇam na jujjai majjā ālaṃghaṇam khu visame vi

original: ruddaṇariṃdaguṇā uṇa hiaaharā kiṃ ṇu kādavvaṃ // ViPrud_4.89 //
analyzed: rudda nariṃda guṇā uṇa hiaa harā kim ṇu kādavvam
a kula vadhūnām na yujyate maryādā laṅghanam khalu viṣame
rudra narendra guṇāḥ punar hṛdaya harāḥ kim nu kartavyam
atha līlā
priya anukaraṇam līlā vāgbhiḥ gatyā atha ceṣṭitaiḥ
yathā

original: aapechchaha sahio esā lacchī raṇṇo paāvaruddassa /
analyzed: sahio esā lacchī raṇṇo paāvaruddassa

original: cariāi aṇukuṇaṃtī raṇṇīsu paivvaā jāā // ViPrud_4.90 //
analyzed: cariāi aṇukuṇaṃtī raṇṇīsu paivvaā jāā
sakhyaḥ eṣā lakṣmī rājñaḥ pratāparudrasya
caritāni anukurvatī rājñīṣu pativratā jātā
atha vilāsaḥ
tātkālikaḥ vikāraḥ syāt vilāsaḥ dayita īkṣaṇe
yathā
sa helam paśyantyāḥ prakṛti subhagam rudra nṛpatim
tadātva pratyudyat vividha lalita āṭopa madhuram
rasa prādurbhāvāt yugapad udayat sāttvikam aho
mṛga akṣyāḥ tāruṇye kusuma śara śilpam vijayate
atha vicchittiḥ
vicchittiḥ ati ramya tvam su alpaiḥ api vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
yathā

original: kassa kie keṇa kiaṃ kāaipuraitthiāṇa suṃderaṃ /
analyzed: kassa kie keṇa kiam
jam sahi
kasya kṛte kena kṛtam kākatipura strīṇām saundaryam
sādhāraṇa bhūṣayā yat sakhi trailokya ramaṇīyam
atha vibhramaḥ
vibhramaḥ tvarayā kāle bhūṣā sthāna viparyayaḥ
yathā

original: asoūṇa sahimuhādo diaho virato tti saṃbhameṇa vahū /
analyzed: sahi muhādaḥ diahaḥ virataḥ tti saṃbhameṇa

original: hatthesu ṇourāiṃ caraṇesu a kuṇai valaāiṃ // ViPrud_4.95 //
analyzed: hatthesu caraṇesu a kuṇai valaāim
a śrutvā sakhī mukhāt divasaḥ virataḥ iti saṃbhrameṇa vadhūḥ
hastayoḥ nūpure caraṇayoḥ ca karoti valayāni
atha kilakiñcitam
roṣa aśru harṣa bhīti ādeḥ saṃkaraḥ kilakiñcitam
yathā
viaṇaṃmi paḍaṃcalam

original: vevai taṇū vi ṇaccai bhiuḍī avi gaggaā vāā // ViPrud_4.96 //
analyzed: vevai taṇū vi ṇaccai bhiuḍī avi gaggaā vāā
gṛhṇati kākatināthe vijane paṭa añcalam mṛga akṣyāḥ

original: vepate tanurapi nṛtyati bhrukuṭyapi gadgadā vācaḥ //)
analyzed: vepate tanuḥ api nṛtyati bhrukuṭī api gadgadāḥ vācaḥ
atha moṭṭāyitam

original: garvo madastathogratvaṃ bhāvā vīre bhavantyamī” // iti/
analyzed: garvaḥ madaḥ tathā ugra tvam bhāvāḥ vīre bhavanti amī iti
rasaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ tirodhatte rasa antaram
iti bhāratīya ukta prakrīyayā yadi api ekaḥ eva rasaḥ
tathā api mahā kavi prasiddhyā rasa saṅakaraḥ svīkriyate

anya aṅga tvena rasa nibandhane rasavat alaṃkāraḥ
bhāva nibandhane preyaḥ laṃkāraḥ
rasa ābhāsa bhāva ābhāsa nibandhane ūrjasvit alaṃkāraḥ
tathā bhāva udaya ādayaḥ pi
rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa tad praśamana nibandhane rasavat preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitāni
bhāva udaya bhāva sandhi bhāva śabala tāḥ ca pṛthak alaṃkārāḥ iti
eteṣām udāharaṇam alaṃkaraṇe bhaviṣyati
sphurat prādurbhāvaḥ krama galita vedya antara matiḥ

original: sukhaṃ vā duḥ khaṃ vā nibiḍayatu yūnoḥ sahṛdaye
analyzed: sukham vā duḥ kham vā nibiḍayatu yūnoḥ sahṛdaye
tu amanda ānanda ātmā pariṇamati pūrṇaḥ rasa bharaḥ

original: raso vākyārthaḥ san vilasati padārthāḥ punaramī
analyzed: rasaḥ vākya arthaḥ san vilasati padārthāḥ punar amī

original: loke syādanukārya eva kathito nāṭye tu sāmājike // ViPrud_4.138 //
analyzed: loke syāt anukāryaḥ eva kathitaḥ nāṭye tu sāmājike

original: atha kāvyajīvitabhūtarasanirūpaṇānantaraṃ tadupaskārahetūnāṃ guṇānāṃ samyagvivekāya doṣā nirūpyante /

a prayuktam apuṣṭa artham asamartham nirarthakam
neyārtham cyuta saṃskāram saṃdigdham ca aprayojakam

a vimṛṣṭa vidheya aṃśam viruddha mati kṛt tathā

original: aślīlaṃ paruṣaṃ ceti doṣāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥ // ViPrud_5.2 //
analyzed: aślīlam paruṣam ca iti doṣāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥ
eṣām svarūpam nirūpyate
yat aprayuktam kavibhiḥ aprayuktam tat ucyate

pāda pūraṇa mātram yat tat nirarthakam ucyate
sva saṃketa prasiddha artham neyārtham parikīrtyate

tat aprayojakam yat syāt aviśeṣa vidhāyakam

prayuktam aprasiddha arthe gūḍha artham parikīrtyate

śāstra mātra prasiddham yat apratītikam ucyate
viparīta artha dhīḥ yasmāt viruddha mati kṛt matam

original: paruṣaṃ nāma tad yat syādvihitaṃ paruṣākṣaraiḥ //
analyzed: paruṣam nāma tat yat syāt vihitam paruṣa akṣaraiḥ

original: atra vanavṛttīnāṃ śatrustrīṇāṃ vacaneṣu doṣā udāhriyante /

a prayuktam yathā

atra daivatā iti puṃliṅga prayogaḥ doṣaḥ

original: duścayavana iti ca indraparatvena kavibhirna prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: duścayavanaḥ iti ca indra para tvena kavibhiḥ na prayuktaḥ
apuṣṭa artham yathā
vyartha aṣṭa ardha ardha bāhūnām amīṣām īdṛśām daśām

original: kathaṃ sahāmahe dhigdhik kaṭhinaṃ hanta jīvitam // ViPrud_5.12 //
analyzed: katham sahāmahe dhik dhik kaṭhinam hanta jīvitam
atra vyartha bāhu dvayānām iti vivakṣite ṣṭa ardha ardha bāhūnām iti anupayuktam

bāhu dvayasya vaiyarthye vidheye tasya upasarjana tvam pratīyate
asamartham yathā
vihāya vasudhām enām catur ambudhara āvṛtām
ka nu gantavyam asmākam araṇye pi asukhā sthitiḥ
atra jaladhi para tvena ambudhara padam asamartham
anarthaka neya artha cyuta saṃskāra saṃdigdhāni yathā
vihāya ca gṛhān tān vai vyatyasta navavṛttayaḥ

original: kadā bhaviṣyate vāsaḥ kaṭakeṣu mahībhṛtān // ViPrud_5.14 //
analyzed: kadā bhaviṣyate vāsaḥ kaṭakeṣu mahībhṛtān
atra vai iti nirarthakam
vyatyasta nava śabdena vana pratītiḥ sva saṃketam ātrāyata iti neyārthakam

original: mahībhṛtāṃ kaṭakeṣu vāsa ityanena rājñāṃ nagareṣu vāsaḥ ?
analyzed: mahībhṛtām kaṭakeṣu vāsaḥ iti anena rājñām nagareṣu vāsaḥ
uta parvatānām nitambeṣu

teṣām arātiḥ garuḍaḥ

original: tasyāgraja indrastasya virodhiṣu parvateṣu ityarthapratīteratidūratvāt kliṣṭam /
analyzed: tasya agrajaḥ indraḥ tasya virodhiṣu parvateṣu iti artha pratīteḥ ati dūra tvāt kliṣṭam

original: parvateṣu vartanaṃ duḥ khāvahamiti prakṛte vajraghaṭṭanāt prāk calātmasviti parvataviśeṣaṇasyānupayuktatvādaprayojakam /

gūḍha artha grāmya arthāni ārthāni yathā

original: atra śoṇitaśabdasya rudhire prasiddhasya pāṭalavarṇaparatvena prayogād gūḍhārtham /

manu upadeśāḥ kva gatāḥ kula ācāryaiḥ udīritāḥ

rājñām akārya mitrāṇām vināśam samupeyuṣām
atra ambikā ramaṇa śabdāt mātṛ saṃbhoga kāriṇaḥ pratītiḥ

viyoga duḥ kha para tayā prayuktāt vināśa śabdāt naśa pratītiḥ iti viruddha mati kṛt
amaṅgala vrīḍā jugupsā pratīti karam trividham aślīlam yathā
abhipreta pada āvāsaḥ kadā naḥ saṃbhaviṣyati

original: yena kākatibhūbhartuḥ sevāṃ hitvā hatā vayam // ViPrud_5.24 //

sam pūrvasya śṛṇoteḥ ātmanepadi tve karmaṇaḥ n upādāna niyamāt

original: atra kariṇo yadvā turagāniti vaktavye vyutkrameṇoktam,

athavā kariṇaḥ iti artha krama bhaṅgaḥ

yaśaḥ pratāpayoḥ magnau sūryācandramasau api

original: atra yaśaḥ pratāpayoścandrasūryau magnāviti śabdakrame ucite tathā noktam /

original: yaśaḥ pratāpayoḥ sūryācandramasau magnāviti samudāyadvayānvaye yathāyogyamarthānvaye siddhe nārthakramavirodhaḥ /

api tu śabda prayogaḥ eva krama bhaṅgaḥ
atha visandhi

original: visaṃhito virūpo vā yasya saṃdhirvisaṃdhi tat /

yathā

original: śauryāṇi īdṛśānyāsan pṛthvaiśvaryaṃ kva vā gatam /

atha vyākīrṇam

yathā

ājñām urasi bibhrāṇāḥ śirasi kroḍa mudrikām

original: atra kroḍamudrikāmurasi śirasyājñāṃ bibhrāṇā iti saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atra kroḍa mudrikām urasi śirasi ājñām bibhrāṇā iti saṃbandhaḥ
atha vākya saṃkīrṇam

mānena mahatā asmābhiḥ vane vaktre na tiṣṭhatām

original: vindhayasya jīvitaṃ tanno jātamadya tṛṇaṃ kṛtam // ViPrud_5.32 //

original: atra mahatā mānena asmābhiryattṛṇaṃ vaktre na kṛtaṃ tadadya vindhyasya vane tiṣṭhatāṃ no jīvitaṃ jātamiti vākyadvayapadānāmanyonyasaṃkīrṇatā
analyzed: atra mahatā mānena asmābhiḥ yat tṛṇam vaktre na kṛtam tat adya vindhyasya vane tiṣṭhatām naḥ jīvitam jātam iti vākya dvaya padānām anyonya saṃkīrṇa tā
atha āpūrṇam

original: apūrṇaṃ tadbhaved yatra na saṃpūrṇaḥ kriyānvayaḥ /
analyzed: apūrṇam tat bhavet yatra na saṃpūrṇaḥ kriyā anvayaḥ
yathā

original: atra śailavāsān vanyavṛttīn mṛgabāndhavān paśyanniti vivakṣitasaṃbandhau na saṃpūrṇaḥ /
analyzed: atra śaila vāsān vanya vṛttīn mṛga bāndhavān paśyan iti vivakṣita saṃbandhau na saṃpūrṇaḥ

original: tad vākyagarbhi taṃ yasya madhye vākyāntaraṃ bhavet // ViPrud_5.34 //

yathā
jñātvā api andhra purī indrasya krodha agnim atiduḥ saham

original: yadvā na laṅghyate daivaṃ tasminnipatitā vayam // ViPrud_5.35 //
analyzed: yat vā na laṅghyate daivam tasmin nipatitāḥ vayam

original: atrātiduḥ sahaṃ krodhāgniṃ jñātvāpi tasminnipatitā vayamiti vākyamadhye yadvā na laṅghyate daivamiti vākyāntaramanupraviṣṭamiti vākyagarbhitatvam

atha bhinna liṅga vacane
yatra upamā bhavet bhinna vacanā bhinna liṅgakā
tat bhinna vacanam bhinna liṅgam ca āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
dvayoḥ udāharaṇam yathā
samudrāḥ iva gambhīram manaḥ yādava bhūbhujaḥ
giriṇā iva andhra nṛpati dhvajinyā kaluṣīkṛtam
atra samudrāḥ iva gambhīram iti bhinna vacanam
giriṇā iva dhvajinyā iti bhinna liṅgam
atha adhika nyūna upame
yatra upamānam adhikam nyūnam vā syāt viśeṣaṇaiḥ

dvayoḥ yathākramam udāharaṇam
kṣāma kṣāma mukhāḥ kāntāḥ kānane mālava īśituḥ

original: atra kṣāmakṣāmamukhānāṃ kāntānāmupamānabhūtāsu nadīṣu mlānapadmatvamātraṃ vaktavyam /

nyūna upamam yathā
hāra aṅgarāga subhagāḥ nagareṣu yathā vayam

atra hāra sthāne nirjharāḥ uktāḥ
aṅgarāga sthāne kim api na uktam iti nyūnopamatvam
atha bhagna chandaḥ yati bhraṣṭe
chandaḥ bhagnam vacaḥ yatra tat bhagnacchandaḥ ucyate
yatra sthāne yati bhraṃśaḥ tat yatibhraṣṭam ucyate
yathā

original: vindhyāraṇyakṛtakuṭumbarakṣaṇasya kiṃ bhadraṃ bhavati janasya mādṛśasya // ViPrud_5.42 //
analyzed: vindhya araṇya kṛta kuṭumba rakṣaṇasya kim bhadram bhavati janasya mādṛśasya

atha aśarīram

yathā
hanta niṣkaruṇaḥ dhātā krīḍataḥ maṇi kuṭṭime

original: hā bandhuvargāḥ sarve 'pi kṛtāntātithayaḥ kṛtāḥ // ViPrud_5.45 //
analyzed: hā bandhu vargāḥ sarve pi kṛtānta atithayaḥ kṛtāḥ

original: yatra visargo bahudhautvaṃ lopaṃ vā prāpnoti tadvisargaluptam /
analyzed: yatra visargaḥ bahudhā tvam lopam vā prāpnoti tat visarga luptam
yathā

original: vyartho manoratho yāto jāto vāso dhruvo marau /
analyzed: vyarthaḥ manorathaḥ yātaḥ jātaḥ vāsaḥ dhruvaḥ marau

original: mlānā dīnā hatā jīrṇā vanānteṣvīdṛśā vayam // ViPrud_5.46 //
analyzed: mlānāḥ dīnāḥ hatāḥ jīrṇāḥ vanānteṣu īdṛśāḥ vayam
atha āsthāna samāsam

original: apadasthasamāsaṃ tat samāso yatra nocitaḥ // ViPrud_5.47 //
analyzed: a pada stha samāsam tat samāsaḥ yatra na ucitaḥ
yathā
kutas vaimukhyam asmāsu brahmaṇaḥ paruṣa ātmanaḥ
iti udagratara bhrāmyat bhṛkuṭī kuṭila ānanāḥ

original: atra vedhase krudhyatāṃ nṛpāṇāmuktau na samāsaḥ /
analyzed: atra vedhase krudhyatām nṛpāṇām uktau na samāsaḥ
kim tu kavi vacane samāse iti apadastha samāsaḥ
atha vācya varjitam
na uktam syāt yatra vaktavyam tat āhuḥ vācya varjitam
yathā
durdaśām pratipannānām asmākam jīvitam matam
atra durdaśām pratipannānām api iti api śabdaḥ vaktavyaḥ na uktaḥ
patat prakarṣam ca
atha samāpta punarāttakam patat prakarṣam ca
samāpya punarādāne samāptapunarāttakam

original: patatprakarṣaṃ tatprāhuḥ prakarṣo yatra viślathaḥ // ViPrud_5.50 //
analyzed: patat prakarṣam tat prāhuḥ prakarṣaḥ yatra viślathaḥ
dvayoḥ udāharaṇam yathā
dhāvat mṛgeṣu saṃbhrāmyat kariṣu udyat tarakṣuṣu
vindhya araṇyeṣu tiṣṭhāmaḥ kṣubhyat bhallūka paṅktiṣu

original: atra vindhyāraṇyeṣu tiṣṭhāmaḥ iti samāpya kṣubhyadbhallūkapaṅktiṣviti punarādānāt samāptapunarāttakam /
analyzed: atra vindhya araṇyeṣu tiṣṭhāmaḥ iti samāpya kṣubhyat bhallūka paṅktiṣu iti punarādānāt samāpta punarāttakam

original: atha bhrāmyatkariṣūdyattarakṣuṣu dhāvanmṛgeṣviti vaktavye na tathoktamiti patatprakarṣatā /
analyzed: atha bhrāmyat kariṣu udyat tarakṣuṣu dhāvat mṛgeṣu iti vaktavye na tathā uktam iti patat prakarṣatā
atha saṃbandha varjitam
saṃbandha varjitam tat syāt yatra iṣṭena anvayaḥ hataḥ
yathā
bhadrāsanāni dṛṣadaḥ chatrāṇi ca mahīruhaḥ
durdaśā rājya mūrdhābhiṣiktāḥ punar aho vayam

original: atra rājye bhadrāsanāni dṛṣada ityādisaṃbandho noktaḥ /
analyzed: atra rājye bhadrāsanāni dṛṣadaḥ ityādi saṃbandhaḥ na uktaḥ
atha adhika padam
yatra adhika pada uktiḥ syāt tatra adhika padam matam
yathā
vimuktāḥ vallabhaiḥ etāḥ vanānte ghūrjara striyaḥ
sudhāṃśu maṇḍala ākāra rūpa krama vipāṇḍurāḥ

original: atra sughāṃśumaṇḍalākāra ityetāvatā paripūrṇe maṇḍalākāravipāṇḍuratve rūpakrama ityadhikam /
analyzed: atra sughā aṃśu maṇḍala ākāraḥ iti etāvatā paripūrṇe maṇḍala ākāra vipāṇḍura tve rūpa kramaḥ iti adhikam
atha bhagna prakramam
prakrānta niyama tyāge bhagna kramam iha ucyate
yathā

original: guhā gṛhāṇi śabarā bāndhavā vindhyabhūḥ purī /
analyzed: guhāḥ gṛhāṇi śabarāḥ bāndhavāḥ vindhyabhūḥ purī

original: sarito dīrghikāḥ kaṣṭamākrīḍāḥ kānanāni naḥ // ViPrud_5.56 //
analyzed: saritaḥ dīrghikāḥ kaṣṭam ākrīḍāḥ kānanāni naḥ

original: atra bahuvacanatayā prathamaṃ prakamya vindhyamūḥ purītyekavacanokteḥ prakramabhraṣṭam /
analyzed: atra bahuvacana tayā prathamam prakamya vindhyamūḥ purī iti ekavacana ukteḥ prakrama bhraṣṭam
atha artha doṣāḥ
apārtham vyartham ekārtham sa saṃśayam apakramam

original: bhinnaṃ caivātimātraṃ ca paruṣaṃ virasaṃ tathā // ViPrud_5.57 //
analyzed: bhinnam ca eva atimātram ca paruṣam virasam tathā
hīna adhika upame syātām asadṛkṣa upamam tathā
aprasiddha upamam hetu śūnyam ca niralaṃkṛti

original: aślīlaṃ ca viruddhaṃ ca tathā sahacaracyutam /
analyzed: aślīlam ca viruddham ca tathā sahacara cyutam
evam aṣṭādaśa proktāḥ doṣāḥ artha samāśrayāḥ
eṣām svarūpam udāharaṇam ca
samudāya artha śūnyam yat apārtham tat prakīrtyate
yathā

original: kutaḥ śuṣyadapā nadyaḥ kā vārtā colamaṇḍale /
analyzed: kutas śuṣyat apāḥ nadyaḥ kā vārtā cola maṇḍale

original: phaṇāḥ sahasraṃ śeṣasya bhāraḥ kati kulācalāḥ // ViPrud_5.60 //
analyzed: phaṇāḥ sahasram śeṣasya bhāraḥ kati kula acalāḥ
atra na kaścid vākya arthaḥ pratīyate
atha vyartham

original: yat prayojanaśūnyaṃ syāt tad vyarthaṃ parikīrtyate // ViPrud_5.61 //
analyzed: yat prayojana śūnyam syāt tat vyartham parikīrtyate
yathā

original: nirmalaṃ kulamudvelaṃ śauryaṃ vaḥ prathitaṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: nirmalam kulam udvelam śauryam vaḥ prathitam yaśaḥ
kim iti andhra pateḥ pāda pīṭham pāṇḍyaiḥ na sevyate

original: atra nirmalaṃ kulamityādipraśaṃsā sevā kartavyetyupadeśe nopayujyate /
analyzed: atra nirmalam kulam ityādi praśaṃsā sevā kartavyā iti upadeśe na upayujyate
atha eka artham
ukta abhinna arthakam yat syāt ekārtham tat nigadyate
yathā

original: viśīrṇaṃ śatadhā ceto mūrcchitān vīkṣya bālakān /
analyzed: viśīrṇam śatadhā cetaḥ mūrcchitān vīkṣya bālakān

original: śiśūn niścetanān dṛṣṭvā khaṇḍitaṃ śataśo manaḥ // ViPrud_5.63 //
analyzed: śiśūn niścetanān dṛṣṭvā khaṇḍitam śataśas manaḥ
atra pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ abhinna artha tvam
atha sa saṃśayam
vākya artha saṃśayaḥ yatra tat sa saṃśayam iṣyate
yathā
kari kumbhau stanau adya jayatām kṣāma tām gatau

original: latā vapuḥ śriyaḥ strīṇāṃ hasantu mlānatāṃ gatāḥ // ViPrud_5.65 //
analyzed: latāḥ vapuḥ śriyaḥ strīṇām hasantu mlāna tām gatāḥ

original: atra karikumbhayoḥ stanayośca latānāṃ vapuḥ śriyāṃ ca kartṛkarmatvasaṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: atra kari kumbhayoḥ stanayoḥ ca latānām vapuḥ śriyām ca kartṛ karma tva saṃśayaḥ
atha apakramam
yatra pūrva aparībhāva vihatiḥ tat apakramam
yathā
hanta vyādāya vaktrāṇi striyaḥ
tṛṇaiḥ tad patitaiḥ asmān śikṣayantyaḥ tathākramam
atra nidrā uttara kālīna mukhya ādānasya pūrva kāla tvam uktam iti apakrama tvam
atha bhinnam

original: saṃbandhavarjitaṃ yat syāt tadbhinnaṃ parikīrtyate // ViPrud_5.67 //
analyzed: saṃbandha varjitam yat syāt tat bhinnam parikīrtyate
yathā

original: nūnaṃ phāleṣu lāṭānāṃ na dhātrā likhitā lipiḥ /
analyzed: nūnam phāleṣu lāṭānām na dhātrā likhitā lipiḥ
yat asmākam kuṭumbāni viṣīdanti maru sthale

original: atra marusthalanivāsaviṣādasya phālasthalagatalipyabhāvasya ca na saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atra marusthala nivāsa viṣādasya phālasthala gata lipya bhāvasya ca na saṃbandhaḥ
atha atimātram
yat sarva loka atītam tat atimātram prakīrtyate
yathā
mā bhūt ekārṇavam viśvam iti saṃkocita aśrubhiḥ
araṇye lāṭa nārībhiḥ asaṃkhyāḥ nimnagāḥ kṛtāḥ
atra aśrubhiḥ jagat ekārṇavam iti ayuktiḥ
atha paruṣam
ati krūra artha sahitam paruṣam parikīrtyate
yathā
dāva anala indhanam sadyas kriyantām arbhakāḥ ime
atra palāni yācamānān śiśūn uddiśya ati paruṣa uktiḥ
atha virasam
aprastuta rasam yat tat virasam parikīrtyate
yathā
candra ānanāḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ naḥ paśyata amṛta varṣibhiḥ
śocitvā alam iti kliṣṭāḥ kirātaiḥ cola subhruvaḥ

original: atra puruṣaviyogakhinnānāṃ strīṇāṃ vanacaraiḥ saṃbhogaprārthanaṃ virasam /
analyzed: atra puruṣa viyoga khinnānām strīṇām vana caraiḥ saṃbhoga prārthanam virasam
atha hīna upamam

original: hīnaṃ yatropamānaṃ syāt taddhi hīnopamaṃ matam // ViPrud_5.73 //
analyzed: hīnam yatra upamānam syāt tat hi hīnopamam matam
yathā
śunakaiḥ iva sāraṅgāḥ bhavadbhiḥ nihatāḥ dviṣaḥ

original: kva gataṃ pauruṣaṃ tadvaḥ kānanaikanivāsinām // ViPrud_5.74 //
analyzed: kva gatam pauruṣam tat vaḥ kānana eka nivāsinām
atra śunakaiḥ iva bhavadbhiḥ iti hīna upamam
atha adhika upamam
yatra upamānam adhikam tat bhavet adhika upamam
yathā
amī pāresaraḥ tīram bakāḥ niścala mūrtayaḥ
mahā ṛṣayaḥ iva asmābhiḥ adya sa upadravāḥ kṛtāḥ
atra bakāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ iva iti adhika upamam
atha a sadṛśa upamam
yat atulya upamānam tat bhavet asadṛśa upamam
yathā
eṣa vindhya acalaḥ sāndra kuñja uccalita nirjharaḥ
phāla īkṣaṇa sphurat vahni śikhā āṭopaḥ iva īśvaraḥ

original: atra kuñjoccalitanirjharasya vindhyācalasya phālekṣaṇaspuradvahnerīśvarasya ca mitho na sādṛśyam /
analyzed: atra kuñja uccalita nirjharasya vindhya acalasya ca mithas na sādṛśyam
atha aprasiddha upamam
aprasiddha upamānam yat aprasiddha upamam matam
yathā
bāṣpa ambu klinna netrāṇi mukhāni aṅga mṛgī dṛśām
hima dūṣita patrāṇi kumudāni iva nirmudām

original: atra mukhānāṃ kumudānyupamānatayā kaviloke na prasiddhāni /
analyzed: atra mukhānām kumudāni upamāna tayā kavi loke na prasiddhāni
atha hetu śūnyam
hetoḥ vinā artha kathanam hetu śūnyam pracakṣate
yathā
mudhā anudhāvanam jātam mārge smin mauktika aṅkite

original: anveṣṭumanyato yāmi padavīyaṃ na subhruvaḥ // ViPrud_5.80 //
analyzed: anveṣṭum anyatas yāmi padavīyam na subhruvaḥ

original: atra subhruvaḥ padavīyaṃ na bhavatīti heturnoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra subhruvaḥ padavīyam na bhavati iti hetuḥ na uktaḥ
atha niralaṃkṛti
alaṃkāreṇa rahitam niralaṃkāram ucyate
yathā
āghrāya surabheḥ yonim unmukhaiḥ dīrgha mehanaiḥ
mahā ukṣeḥ lambamāna aṇḍaiḥ vyākulitam vanam
atra na kaścid alaṃkāraḥ
ślādhya viśeṣaṇa abhāvāt na sva abhāva uktiḥ
atha aślīlam
aślīla arthasya kathanam aślīlam parikīrtyate
asya api pūrvam eva udāharaṇam
atha viruddham
viruddham deśa kāla ādi viruddham bahudhā ucyate
yathā
diśi uttarasyām nedīyān udvelaḥ lavaṇārṇavaḥ

original: marudeśe 'pi gaṅgā naḥ pipāsāṃ śāmayiṣyati // ViPrud_5.83 //
analyzed: maru deśe pi gaṅgā naḥ pipāsām śāmayiṣyati
atra diśi uttarasyām lavaṇārṇavaḥ iti diś virodhaḥ
marau gaṅgā iti deśa virodhaḥ
araṇya mahiṣa udagra viṣāṇa udara janmanām
mahati arghe muktānām striyaḥ muktā vibhūṣaṇāḥ
atra mahiṣa viṣāṇebhyaḥ muktānām janma iti loka virodhaḥ
evam viruddha antaram api udāhāryam
atha sahacara bhraṣṭam
matam sahacara bhraṣṭam atulyānām nibandhane
yathā

original: śāntyā śrutaṃ hriyā nārī manmathena ratotsavaḥ /
analyzed: śāntyā śrutam hriyā nārī manmathena rata utsavaḥ

original: śrutena dhiṣaṇā vanyavṛttyā jīvanti śātravāḥ // ViPrud_5.86 //
analyzed: śrutena dhiṣaṇāḥ vanya vṛttyā jīvanti śātravāḥ
atra śruta dhiṣaṇābhyām nārī rata utsavayoḥ apakṛṣṭa tvāt sahacara bhraṣṭam
evam doṣa antarāṇi yathāsaṃbhavam ūhyāni
rasa bhāva ādīnām sva śabda vācya tā duṣṭā eva
iti śrī vidyānātha kṛtau pratāparudrayaśobhūṣaṇe laṃkāraśāstre
doṣa prakaraṇam samāptam vi
atha guṇa prakaraṇam
atha guṇāḥ nirūpyante
śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā mādhuryam sukumāratā
artha vyaktiḥ udāra tvam tathā kāntiḥ udātta tā
ojaḥ su śabda tā preyān aurjityam atha vistaraḥ

original: samādhiḥ saukṣmyagāmbhīrye saṃkṣepo bhāvikaṃ tathā // ViPrud_6.2 //
analyzed: samādhiḥ saukṣmya gāmbhīrye saṃkṣepaḥ bhāvikam tathā
saṃmita tvam tathā prauḍhī rītiḥ uktiḥ gatiḥ tathā
caturviṃśatiḥ ete syuḥ guṇāḥ kāvya prakāśakāḥ
eṣām madhye keṣāṃcid doṣa parihāraka tvena guṇa tvam
keṣāṃcid svatas eva utkarṣa hetu tvāt guṇa tvam

original: tatra ye svata eva cārutvātiśayahetavaste paramutkṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: tatra ye svatas eva cāru tva atiśaya hetavaḥ te param utkṛṣṭāḥ
duṣṭa tva parihāra hetūnām guṇa tvam na sarva saṃmatam

original: ye tu doṣābhāvatayā guṇatvamicchanti teṣāmeva saukumāryādayo guṇatvena saṃmatāḥ /
analyzed: ye tu doṣa abhāvatayā guṇa tvam icchanti teṣām eva saukumārya ādayaḥ guṇa tvena saṃmatāḥ
śruti kaṭu rūpa doṣa nirākaraṇāya saukumāryam saṃmatam
grāmya doṣa nirākaraṇāya kāntiḥ svīkṛtā
apuṣṭa artha nirākaraṇāya artha vyaktiḥ matā
nyūnādhika pada nirākaraṇāya saṃmita tvam matam
anucita artha nirākaraṇa artham udātta tā svīkṛtā
visaṃdhi nirākaraṇāya aurjityam matam
patat prakarṣa nirākaraṇāya rītiḥ iṣṭā
kliṣṭa parihārāya prasādaḥ mataḥ
aślīla parihāra artha muktiḥ svīkṛtā
cyuta saṃskāra parihāra artham sauśabdyam iṣṭam
prakrama bhaṅga nirākaraṇāya samatā matā
paruṣa doṣa nivṛtti artham preyān mataḥ
evam yathāsaṃbhavam keṣāṃcid doṣa parihāraka tvena guṇa tvam
eṣām guṇānām svarūpam udāharaṇam ca
mithas saṃśliṣṭa pada tā śleṣaḥ iti abhidhīyate
bahūnām padānām eka pada vat avabhāsamāna tvam śliṣṭa tvam
yathā
n māṇikya dyuti rañjita aṅghrim akhila prakhyāta śaurya udayam
vyoma āgāram analpa vaibhavam amum stotum vayam neśmahe
atra pāṭha samaye padānām eka vat avabhāsamāna tvāt śleṣaḥ
atha prasādaḥ

original: prasiddhārthapadatvaṃ yat sa prasādo nigadyate // ViPrud_6.5 //
analyzed: prasiddha artha pada tvam yat sa prasādaḥ nigadyate
yathā
pratāparudra devaḥ yam bhāti lakṣmīpatiḥ svayam
yena āmya locane phulla puṇḍarīka manohare
atra jhaṭiti artha samarpaka pada tvāt prasādaḥ
atha samatā
avaiṣamyeṇa bhaṇanam sama tā sā nigadyate
yathā
vadānya taru mañjarī surabhyaḥ śravaḥ pāraṇam
guṇāḥ vidadhate satām jagati vīra rudra prabhoḥ
sudhā madhurima adharīkaraṇa cāturī cuñcavaḥ
viyat cara taraṅgiṇī viharat ūrmi marma spṛśaḥ
atra pāda catuṣṭye tulya vat bhaṇanāt sama tvam
atha mādhuryam

original: yā pṛthakpadatā vākye tanmādhuryaṃ prakīrtyate // ViPrud_6.8 //
analyzed: yā pṛthakpada tā vākye tat mādhuryam prakīrtyate
yathā
yaśaḥ śriyaḥ kākati bhūpateḥ diśām nitamba bimbeṣu dukūla rītayaḥ
urojayoḥ mauktika hāra vibhramāḥ śirassu jātī kusuma sraj ujjvalāḥ
atra vākye pāṭha samaye pi pṛthakpada tva pratīteḥ mādhuryam
atha su kumāra tvam
su kumāra akṣara prāyam saukumāryam tat ucyate
sukumāra tvam nāma sa anusvāra komala varṇa tvam
yathā
nagare kākati indrasya divā api ābhāti candrikā
atha artha vyaktiḥ
yat tu saṃpūrṇa vākya tvam artha vyaktim vadanti tām
yathā
bhāgyam madhyama loka nighnam adhunā yena asya saṃrakṣitā
jātaḥ khelati vīra rudra nṛpatiḥ niḥ sīma śaurya udayaḥ

original: yadvā trīṇyapi viṣṭapāni dadhate dhanyatvamaṃśo harer-
analyzed: yat vā trīṇi api viṣṭapāni dadhate dhanya tvam aṃśaḥ hareḥ

original: yat sākṣādavatīrya kākatikule svairaṃ samujjṛmbhate // ViPrud_6.12 //
analyzed: yat sākṣāt avatīrya kākati kule svairam samujjṛmbhate
atra artha pratipādane vākyasya nirākāṅkṣa tayā paripūrṇa tvāt artha vyaktiḥ
atha kāntiḥ
ati ujjvala tvam bandhasya kāvye kāntiḥ iti iṣyate
yathā
jetuḥ kākati vīra rudra nṛpateḥ jaitra prayāṇa utthite
kṣoṇī reṇu bhare nabhasi ati bhṛśam bhū vibhramam bibhrati
jātā martya nadī viśaṅkaṭa taṭī dīrghā viyat dīrdhikā

original: gāḍhaṃ gūḍhatamā ca gautamanadī pātālagaṅgāyate // ViPrud_6.13 //
analyzed: gāḍham gūḍhatamā ca gautamanadī pātālagaṅgāyate
atha audāryam
vikaṭa akṣara bandha tvam āryaiḥ audāryam iṣyate
yathā
jagdhvā bhūyāṃsi māṃsāni ahamahamikayā sapītyā
masrasya uccaistara asthi utkaṣaṇa bhava kaṭatkāra raudra agra daṃṣṭrān
saṃbibhrāṇāḥ kṣapāṭān dvipa galita vasā nirjhara antar nadīṣṇān
kurvanti āyodhana urvyaḥ bhayam avani bhṛtām andhra sainyena sṛṣṭāḥ
atha udātta tā
ślāghyaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ yogaḥ yaḥ tu sā syāt udātta tā
yathā
bṛṃhamāṇa gaja ākīrṇā hreṣamāṇa haya ākulā
saṃkrīḍat syandanā kṣveḍa bhaṭā rudra vibhoḥ camūḥ
atha ojaḥ
ojaḥ samāsa bhūyaḥ tvam
yathā
uddāma dvirada ogha dāna laharī saurabhya lobha bhramat
bhṛṅga śreṇi nibaddha jhaṃkṛti kalā vācālita prāṅgaṇāḥ
niḥ
modante bhuvi vīra rudra nṛpateḥ vidvas gṛha śreṇayaḥ
atha su śabda tā

original: supāṃ tiṅāṃ ca vyutpattiḥ sauśabdyaṃ parikīrtyate /
analyzed: supām tiṅām ca vyutpattiḥ sauśabdyam parikīrtyate
yathā
āśā maṇḍala kūlam udvaha kathaiḥ abbhraṅkaṣaiḥ vaibhavaiḥ
rakṣan suprajasaḥ prajāḥ tribhuvana kṣemaṅkara prakriyaḥ
duṣṭānām bhuvi niprahantum atulaiḥ āḍhyaṃbhaviṣṇuḥ guṇaiḥ

original: bhūmnā saṃcarate 'dya kākatikule rudrāvatāro hariḥ // ViPrud_6.19 //
analyzed: bhūmnā saṃcarate kākati kule rudra avatāraḥ hariḥ
atha preyaḥ
preyaḥ priyatara ākhyānam cāṭu uktau yat vidhīyate
yathā
dākṣiṇyam tvayi
dakṣatā tvayi
dayā tvayi unnata tvam tvayi
prāgalbhyam tvayi
pauruṣam tvayi
kalā saṃpad tvayi śrīḥ tvayi
audāryam tvayi
dhīra tā tvayi
jagat dhaureya tā ca tvayi
śrīmat kākatinātha
pālaya bhuvam vairiñca kalpān śatam
atha airjityam
aurji tvam gāḍha bandha tvam
yathā
kṣudra kṣatriya pakṣa śikṣaṇa vidhau protkṣipta kaukṣeyakāḥ
uddāma udyamanasya rudra nṛpateḥ deḥ daṇḍayoḥ caṇḍayoḥ
garjat durjana garva parvata bhidā dambha ulayaḥ kelayaḥ
atha samādhiḥ
samādhiḥ anya dharmāṇām yat anyatra adhiropaṇam
yathā
pṛcchantī dugdha sindhum kuśalam anusarantī ādarāt śaṅkara adrim
cāṭu uktyā mānayantī muhur amara nadīm candram agre hasantī
vaidhātrīm yāna haṃsa āvalim anu kṛpayā svāgatam vyāharantī

original: lokeṣu triṣvamīṣu prabhavati mahatī vīrarudrasya kīrttiḥ // ViPrud_6.24 //
analyzed: lokeṣu triṣu amīṣu prabhavati mahatī vīrarudrasya kīrttiḥ
atha vistaraḥ
samarthana prapañca uktiḥ uktasya arthasya vistaraḥ
yathā
lokeṣu triṣu kākatī īśvara guṇān stotum muhur vīkṣitum

original: śrotuṃ bahvabhinandituṃ ca phaṇināmekaḥ kṣamo nāyakaḥ /
analyzed: śrotum bahu abhinanditum ca phaṇinām ekaḥ kṣamaḥ nāyakaḥ

original: yadvaktrāṇi sahasramasya kṛtino yad dve sahasre dṛśa-
analyzed: yad vaktrāṇi sahasram asya kṛtinaḥ yat dve sahasre

original: stā eva śrutayaḥ phaṇā daśaśatānyatyadbhutāndolane // ViPrud_6.25 //
analyzed: stāḥ eva śrutayaḥ phaṇāḥ daśa śatāni ati adbhuta āndolane
atha saṃmita tvam
yāvat artha pada tvam tu saṃmita tvam udāhṛtam
yathā
kākatīya narendrasya kīrtti candana carcanam
diś aṅganāḥ vitanvanti vataṃsīkṛta tad guṇāḥ
atha gāmbhīryam
dhvanimat tā tu gāmbhīryam
yathā

original: viṣaṃ kaukṣeyake gaṅgā kīrttau digvasanaṃ ripau /
analyzed: viṣam kaukṣeyake gaṅgā kīrttau digvasanam ripau

original: indurmukhe ca rudrasya kākatīyasya dṛśyate // ViPrud_6.28 //
analyzed: induḥ mukhe ca rudrasya kākatīyasya dṛśyate
atra śaṅkarasya kaṇṭhe viṣam
maulau gaṅgā
kaṭi sthale digvastram
śirasi candraḥ iti dhvanyate
atha saṃkṣepaḥ

original: saṃkṣiptārthābhidhānaṃ yat tat saṃkṣepaḥ prakīrtyate // ViPrud_6.29 //
analyzed: saṃkṣipta artha abhidhānam yat tat saṃkṣepaḥ prakīrtyate
yathā
vaṃśaḥ sti kākatīyānām tatra āsan bahavaḥ nṛpāḥ
teṣām bhāgya vivartaḥ yam vīrarudraḥ nareśvaraḥ
atra ati vistara kathana yogya arthasya saṃkṣepa ukteḥ saṃkṣepaḥ
atha saukṣmyam
antar saṃjalpa rūpa tvam śabdānām saukṣmyam ucyate
yathā
adhyadhas parisaṃśliṣṭāḥ ṣṭhā kṛñ bhūdhātavaḥ sadā
vartante kākatīya indre kartari anyatra karmaṇi

original: atrādhitiṣṭhatyadhaḥ karoti paribhavatītyantaḥ saṃjalparūpatvāt saukṣmyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atra adhitiṣṭhati adhas karoti paribhavati iti antar saṃjalpa rūpa tvāt saukṣmyam bhavati
atha prauḍhiḥ

original: prauḍhirukteḥ parīpāka iti kāvyavido viduḥ // ViPrud_6.32 //
analyzed: prauḍhiḥ ukteḥ parīpākaḥ iti kāvya vidaḥ viduḥ
yathā
vīpsā padma bhavasya candra mukuṭasya āvṛttiḥ āmreḍitam
daityāreḥ pratibimbanam suragireḥ indoḥ samuttejanam
karṇa ādeḥ punar udbhavaḥ sura taroḥ sarva svam āviṣkriyā
svardhenoḥ iti tarkayanti kavayaḥ śrī vīrarudra prabhum
atha uktiḥ
vidagdha bhaṇitiḥ yā
syāt uktim tām kavayaḥ viduḥ
yathā

original: diṭṭhā kamalāsattī raṇṇo tuha suhaa cittacariatsa /
analyzed: diṭṭhā kamala āsattiḥ raṇṇo tuha suhaa

original: bhāsanto vi tumaṃ taṃ kuvalaalacchiṃ pasāhesi // ViPrud_6.34 //
analyzed: bhāsantaḥ vi tumam tam kuvala alacchim pasāhesi
dṛṣṭā kamala āsaktiḥ rājñaḥ tava subhaga citra caritasya
bhāsvān api tvam tām kuvalaya lakṣmīm prasādhayasi
atha rītiḥ
yathā upakrama nirvāhaḥ rītiḥ iti abhidhīyate
yathā

original: ṣaḍ guṇān sevate rājā ṣaḍ ripūnavamanyate /
analyzed: ṣaṭ guṇān sevate rājā ṣaṭ ripūn avamanyate

original: ṣaḍ darśanānyupādatte ṣaḍ balāni ca vīkṣate // ViPrud_6.36 //
analyzed: ṣaḍ darśanāni upādatte ṣaḍ balāni ca vīkṣate
atha bhāvikam
bhavataḥ vākya vṛttiḥ yā bhāvikam tat udāhṛtam
yathā
svāmin tāta kula uttaṃsa vīrarudra jagatprabho
putriṇām dhuram eṣaḥ ham putreṇa āropitaḥ tvayā
atra prema rūpa bhāva vaśāt vākya vṛttiḥ
atha gatiḥ
gatiḥ nāma su ramya tvam svarāroha avarohayoḥ
yathā
prakāśye trailokye satatam atulaiḥ kākati vibhoḥ
mahobhiḥ niḥ sīmaiḥ dinakara kara āṭopa paṭubhiḥ
tamaḥ kṛtsnam śoka jvalat anala rociḥ paricayam
dadhatsu api udvelati ari nṛpa manassu eva satatam
atra pūrva ardhe dīrgha akṣara prāya tvāt svarasya ārohaḥ
uttara ardhe varohaḥ
eteṣām guṇānām artha gata tvam api kecid icchanti
prācām ācāryāṇām matena saṃghaṭana āśraya tvam eva guṇānām
tat uktam alaṃkāra sarva sve saṃghaṭana dharma tvena śabda artha dharma tvena ca guṇa alaṃkārāṇām vyavasthānam iti
anayā eva bhaṅgyā guṇa alaṃkārāṇām nirūpitaḥ svarūpa bhedaḥ
anyathā svarūpa bhedasya durnirūpa tvāt
yaḥ hetuḥ kāvya śobhāyāḥ saḥ laṃkāraḥ prakīrtyate

original: guṇo 'pi tādṛśo jñeyo doṣaḥ syāt tadviparyayaḥ // '; iti /
analyzed: guṇaḥ tādṛśaḥ jñeyaḥ doṣaḥ syāt tad viparyayaḥ iti
atas guṇānām saṃghaṭana āśraya tvam eva yuktam
iti śrī vidyānātha kṛtau pratāparudrayaśobhūṣaṇe laṃkāraśāstre
guṇa prakaraṇam samāptam vii
atha śabdālaṃkāra prakaraṇam
alaṅkāra svarūpa nirūpaṇam
atha guṇa nirūpaṇa anantaram alaṅkārāḥ nirūpyante
alaṃkriyate nena iti cāru tva hetuḥ alaṃkāraḥ
tathā ca uktam kāvyaprakāśe
upaskurvanti tam santam ye ṅga dvāreṇa saṃśritāḥ
hāra ādi vat alaṃkārāḥ te nuprāsa upamā ādayaḥ
iti
yathā kara caraṇa ādi avayava gataiḥ para ādibhiḥ tad tad alaṃkāra tayā prasiddhaiḥ avayavī eva alaṃkriyate
tathā śabda artha avayava gataiḥ anuprāsa upamā ādibhiḥ tad tad alaṃkāra tayā prasiddhaiḥ avayavībhūtam kāvyam upaskriyate
āśraya āśrayi bhāvena alaṃkārya alaṃkāra bhāvaḥ loka vat kāvye pi saṃmataḥ
cāru tva hetu tve pi guṇānām alaṃkārāṇām ca āśraya bhedāt bheda vyapadeśaḥ
saṃghaṭana āśrayāḥ guṇāḥ
śabda artha āśrayāḥ tu alaṃkārāḥ
tatra prathamam śabda artha ubhaya gata tvena traividhyam alaṃkāra vargasya
artha alaṃkārāṇām cāturvidhyam
kecid pratīyamāna vastavaḥ
kecid pratīyamāna aupamyāḥ kecid pratīyamāna rasa bhāva ādayaḥ
kecid asphuṭa pratīyamānāḥ iti
samāsokti paryāyokti ākṣepa vyāja stuti upameya upamā ananvaya atiśayokti parikara aprastuta praśaṃsā anukta nimitta viśeṣa ukti ṣu pratīyamānam vastu kāvya upaskāra tām upayāti
rūpaka pariṇāma saṃdeha bhrāntimat ullekha apahnava utprekṣā smaraṇa tulya yogitā dīpaka prativastūpamā dṛṣṭānta sahokti vyatireka nidarśana āśleṣeṣu aupamyam
rasavat preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhita bhāva udaya bhāva saṃdhi bhāva śabala tāsu rasa bhāva ādiḥ vyajyate

upamā vinokti artha antara nyāsa virodha vibhāvanā ukta guṇa nimitta viśeṣa ukti viṣa sama citra adhika anyonya kāraṇa mālā eka āvalī vyāghāta mālā dīpaka kāvya liṅga anumāna sāra yathā saṃkhyā arthāpatti paryāya parivṛtti parisaṃkhyā vikalpa samuccaya samādhi pratyanīka pratī
sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādi sphuṭam pratīyamānam na asti
atra ittham alaṃkāra kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ
sādharmyam trividham bheda pradhānam abheda pradhānam bheda abheda pradhānam ca iti
upamāna upameyayoḥ svatas bhinna tvāt śābdam etat na vāstavam
rūpaka pariṇāma saṃdeha bhrāntimat ullekha apahnavānām abheda pravāna sādharmya nibandhana tvam
dīpaka tulya yogitā nidarśana adṛṣṭānta prativastu upamā sahokti pratīpa vyatirekāḥ bheda pradhāna sādhargya nibandhanāḥ
upamā an anvaya upameya upamā smaraṇānām bheda abheda sādhāraṇa sādharmya mūla tā
utprekṣā atiśayoktī adhyavasāya mūle
vibhāvanā viśeṣa ukti viṣama citra asaṅgati anyonya vyāghāta a tad guṇa bhāvika viśeṣāṇām virodha mūla tā
yathā saṃkhya parisaṃkhyā arthāpatti vikalpa samuccayānām vākya nyāya mūla tā
parivṛtti pratyanīka tad guṇa samādhi sama svabhāva ukti udātta vinoktayaḥ loka vyavahāra mūlāḥ
kāvya liṅga anumāna artha antaranyāsānām tarka nyāya mūla tā
vyāja ukti vakra ukti mīlanāni apahnava mūlāni
atha alaṃkārāṇām paraspara vailakṣaṇya nirūpyate
āropa garbha tve pi āropyamāṇasya prakṛta upayoga anupayogābhyām pariṇāma rūpakayoḥ bhedaḥ
āropa viṣayasya āropyamāṇa rūpa saṃbhava asaṃbhavābhyām ullekha rūpakayoḥ bhedaḥ

original: āropaviṣayasya saṃdehabhrānt yapahnavaiḥ sandehabhrāntimadapahnavānāṃ parasparaṃ bhedaḥ /
analyzed: āropa viṣayasya sandeha bhrānt yapahnavaiḥ sandeha bhrāntimat apahnavānām parasparam bhedaḥ
sādharmya mūla tve pi tulya yogitā dīpaka nidarśana avyatireka dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sādharmyasya vācya tvāt upamā ananvaya upameyopamāḥ bhidyante
sādharmyasya vācya tva gamya tvābhyām upameya upamā prativastūpamayoḥ bhedaḥ
vastu prativastu bimba pratibimba bhāvābhyām prativastu upamā dṛṣṭāntayoḥ bhedaḥ
prastuta aprastutānām vyasta samasta tvābhyām tulya yogitā dīpakayoḥ bhedaḥ
upamānasya prasiddha tva aprasiddha tvābhyām upamā utprekṣayoḥ bhedaḥ
artha sāmya śabda sāmyābhyām upamā āśleṣayoḥ bhedaḥ
upamāna upameyayoḥ bheda abhedābhyām upamā anvayayoḥ bhedaḥ
upamāna upameya bhāvasya paryāya yaugapadyābhyām upameya upamā anvayayoḥ bhedaḥ
aprastutasya vācya tva gamya tvābhyām aprastuta praśaṃsā samāsoktyoḥ bhedaḥ
vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ prastuta tve paryāyoktiḥ vācyasya aprastuta tve prastuta praśaṃsā
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā ādi abhāvāt kāvya liṅgasya anumānāt bhedaḥ
sādhāraṇa guṇa yogāt bheda anupalabdhau sāmānyam
utkṛṣṭa guṇa yogāt nyūna guṇa tirodhāne mīlanam
anya vyavacchede tātparya abhāvāt uttara alaṃkārasya parisaṃkhyātaḥ bhedaḥ
kākatālīya tayā kārya sādhane kāraṇa antara upanipāte samādhiḥ

original: ahamahamikayā kāryasādhane bahūnāṃ kāraṇānāmudyame dvitīyaḥ samuccayaḥ /
analyzed: ahamahamikayā kārya sādhane bahūnām kāraṇānām udyame dvitīyaḥ samuccayaḥ
nihnavasya vācya tva gamya tvābhyām apahnava vyāja stutyoḥ bhedaḥ
anyeṣām bhedaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva
yadi api vyāja ukti mīla sāmānyeṣu kathaṃcid sādṛśyam asti
tathā api avivakṣita tvāt na sādṛśya mūleṣu gaṇanā
śabda alaṃkārāḥ nirūpyante

original: athālaṃkārasvarūpavibhāgānantaraṃ śabdārthayormadhye śabdasyārthaṃ pratītyantaraṅgatvāt prathamaṃ śabdālaṃkārā nirūpyante /
analyzed: atha alaṃkāra svarūpa vibhāga anantaram śabda arthayoḥ madhye śabdasya artham prati iti antaraṅga tvāt prathamam śabdālaṃkārāḥ nirūpyante
cheka anuprāsaḥ
bhavet avyavadhānena dvayoḥ vyañjana yugmayoḥ
āvṛttiḥ yatra sa budhaiḥ cheka anuprāsaḥ iṣyate
yatra avyavahitayoḥ vyañjana yugmayoḥ dvayoḥ paunaruktyam tatra cheka anuprāsaḥ
yathā
vṛtti anuprāsaḥ
eka dvi prabhṛtīnām tu vyañjanānām yathā bhavet
punaruktiḥ asau nāma vṛtti anuprāsaḥ iṣyate
yathā
re re kṣudra mahīkṣitaḥ

original: kṣaṇamitaḥ śrīkākatikṣmāpater- vīkṣadhvaṃ dhvajinīṃ durīkṣasubhaṭāṃ protkṣiptakaukṣeyakaiḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇam itas śrī kākati kṣmāpateḥ vīkṣadhvam dhvajinīm durīkṣa su bhaṭām protkṣipta kaukṣeyakaiḥ

original: yotsyadhve yadi labhyamakṣayapadaṃ kāntārapakṣo vṛthā kṣmābhṛtkukṣicarattarakṣunikarāt tatrātmarakṣā kutaḥ // ViPrud_7.4 //
analyzed: yotsyadhve yadi labhyam akṣaya padam kāntāra pakṣaḥ vṛthā kṣmābhṛt kukṣi carat tarakṣu nikarāt tatra ātma rakṣā kutas
yamakam
yamakam paunaruktye tu svara vyañjana yugmayoḥ
cheka anuprāse vṛtti anuprāse ca svara paunaruktya mānuṣaṅgikam
yamake tu sa svarayoḥ vyañjana yugmayoḥ āvṛttiḥ
tasya ādi madhya anta gata tvena bahavaḥ bhedāḥ
atra diś mātram udāhriyate
pratāpaḥ kākati indrasya mahā mahima tejasaḥ
śriyam dadhāti padma iṣṭa mahā mahima tejasaḥ
yatra arthaḥ pramukhe kiṃcid bhāsate punarukta vat
punar ukta vat ābhāsaḥ laṃkāraḥ sa satām mataḥ
yatra arthaḥ punarukta vat ābhāsate
anvaya velāyām anyathā bhavati
sa punar ukta vat ābhāsaḥ laṃkāraḥ
artha alaṅkāra tve pi asya śabda paunaruktya āśrita tvāt śabdālaṃkāra prastāve lakṣaṇam kṛtam
yathā
jiṣṇuḥ indraḥ kṣitibhujām śrīpatiḥ puruṣottamaḥ
bhāsvān sūrya sphurat tejāḥ kākatīndraḥ virājate
atha ubhaya paunaruktyā alaṃkāraḥ kathyate
lāṭa anuprāsaḥ
śabda arthayoḥ paunaruktyam yatra tātparya bheda vat
sa kāvya tātparya vidām lāṭānuprāsaḥ iṣyate
yatra śabda arthayoḥ tātparya bheda mātram na svarūpa bhedaḥ tatra lāṭānuprāsaḥ
yathā
guṇāḥ guṇāḥ te gaṇyante ye rudra nṛpam āśritāḥ
nītiḥ nītiḥ asau tasya lakṣmīḥ laṃkṣmīḥ ca kathyate
padma ādi ākāra hetu tve varṇānām citram ucyate
ādi grahaṇāt cakrabandha ādayaḥ
tatra aṣṭadala padma bandhaḥ yathā
yātā yasya asamagra ānatim iha kanaka āsthāna sakta āsanāyā
yā an āsakta āsana sthā sukhayatu kamala abhyāsa su jñāna māyā

original: yā mānajñā susabhyā kṣitipatitilakaṃ jñātiraktā sageyā
analyzed: yā māna jñā su sabhyā kṣitipati tilakam jñāti raktā sa geyā

original: yāge saktā ratijñā sukṛtiṣu phalitagrāmasasyāyatāyā // ViPrud_7.11 //
analyzed: yāge saktā rati jñā sukṛtiṣu phalita grāma sasya āyatāyā
cakrabandhaḥ yathā
lakṣmī vīkṣita vaibhavasya jagatām nāthasya bhadra śriyaḥ
dikṣu ārabdha nija pratāpa janitām bhā kṛt dhurām yacchataḥ

original: nityaṃ rudrajanādhipasya jayino bhāti prikāśaṃ sthirā
analyzed: nityam rudra janādhipasya jayinaḥ bhāti prikāśam sthirā
rājat pālana modita ātmani bhuje yogya āśrita tvāt dharā
atra cakrabandhe vaijanātha kṛti vīrarudra yaśaḥ iti pratīyate
nāga bandhaḥ yathā
ojasye rudra deve vibhavati mahima tyājita anya pratāpe
vidyā varye bhinetari uruhari caritam viśva vistāra bhāji
vairi vrātāḥ bhajante vanam ati malina khyātayaḥ deva viddhā

original: vanyairadhvanyavāri kṣatimati vividhe jantubhiḥ sthānabhājaḥ // ViPrud_7.13 //
analyzed: vanyaiḥ adhvanya vāri kṣatimati vividhe jantubhiḥ sthāna bhājaḥ
iti śrī vidyānātha kṛtau pratāparudrayaśobhūṣaṇe laṃkāraśāstre
śabdālaṃkāra prakaraṇam samāptam
atha arthālaṃkārāḥ
tatra prathamam aneka alaṃkāra bīja bhūta tvāt upamā nirūpyate

original: svataḥ siddhena bhinnena saṃmatena ca dharmataḥ /
analyzed: svatas siddhena bhinnena saṃmatena ca dharmataḥ
sāmyam anyena varṇyasya vācyam ced ekadā upamā

original: yatra svataḥ siddhena svato bhinnena sahṛdayasaṃmatenāprakṛtena saha prakṛtasya dharmataḥ sādṛśyamekadā vācyaṃ ced bhavati tatropamā /
analyzed: yatra svatas siddhena svatas bhinnena sahṛdaya saṃmatena aprakṛtena saha prakṛtasya dharmataḥ sādṛśyam ekadā vācyam ced bhavati tatra upamā
svatas siddhena iti anena utprekṣā vyāvṛttiḥ
utprekṣāyām aprasiddhasya api upamāna tva saṃbhavāt
yathā
kīrttiḥ kākati vīrudra nṛpateḥ siṃhāsana adhyāsinaḥ
prācām bhumībhujām yaśaḥ pidadhatī koṭī indu tulya dyutiḥ
railokya aṭṭahāsa prabhave kakubhām prānteṣu vidyotate
atra prabhā śabdaḥ jāti vacanaḥ
trailokya aṭṭahāsa prabhāyāḥ kavi prauḍha ukti siddha tvāt na upamā śaṅkā avakāśaḥ
svatas bhinnena iti anena ananvaya nyāvṛttiḥ
ananvaye ekasya eva upamāna upameya tva saṃbhavāt tathā hi
santu loke suvarṇa adri ratna ākara sudhākarāḥ

original: tathāpi vīrarudro 'yaṃ vīrarudra iva svayam // ViPrud_8.3 //
analyzed: tathā api vīrarudraḥ yam vīrarudraḥ iva svayam
saṃmatena iti anena nyūnopamā ādi vyāvṛttiḥ yathā
udanvān iva gambhīraḥ suvarṇa adriḥ iva unnataḥ
diś mahā ibhaḥ iva kṣoṇī dhaureyaḥ kākati īśvaraḥ
atra samudra suvarṇa adri diggajānām upamāna tvam yogyam iti upamā eva iyam
dharmataḥ iti anena śleṣa alaṃkāra vailakṣaṇyam

original: śleṣe śabdasāmyamātramabhyupagataṃ na guṇakriyāsāmyam / tathā hi ---
analyzed: śleṣe śabda sāmya mātram abhyupagatam na guṇa kriyā sāmyam tathā hi
nīrājayanti adhra purī ramaṇyaḥ pradīpa jālaiḥ vara vīra rudram
candra ānanāḥ gotra patim rajanyaḥ tārā gaṇaiḥ merum iva sphuradbhiḥ

original: atra pratāparudraṃ purastriyo nīrājayanti meruṃ rajanya iveti nopamā /
analyzed: atra pratāpa rudram pura striyaḥ nīrājayanti merum rajanyaḥ iva iti na upamā
gotra patim iti viśeṣaṇa arthasya sāmya abhāvāt
gotra śabdena rāja pakṣe kula pratītiḥ
meru pakṣe parva pratītiḥ

original: tathā candrānanā iti strīpakṣe candra iva ānanaṃ yāsāmiti samāsaḥ /
analyzed: tathā candra ānanāḥ iti strī pakṣe candraḥ iva ānanam yāsām iti samāsaḥ

original: rātripakṣe candra evānanaṃ yāsāmiti śabdamātrasāmyena nopamāprāptiḥ /
analyzed: rātri pakṣe candraḥ eva ānanam yāsām iti śabda mātra sāmyena na upamā prāptiḥ
kim tu śleṣaḥ eva

original: anyena varṇyasya sāmyamityanena pratīpālaṃkāro vyāvartyate / tathā hi---
analyzed: anyena varṇyasya sāmyam iti anena pratīpālaṃkāraḥ vyāvartyate tathā hi
lokaḥ yama viśeṣa jñaḥ kim kurmaḥ kasya kathyate
yat kākati narendreṇa sumeruḥ upamīyate

original: atrāprakṛtasya meroḥ prakṛtena rājñā sādṛśyamiti pratīpālaṃkāro nopamā /
analyzed: atra aprakṛtasya meroḥ prakṛtena rājñā sādṛśyam iti pratīpa alaṃkāraḥ na upamā
ekadā sāmyam iti anena upameya upamā vyāvṛttiḥ
upameya upamāyām upamāna upameyayoḥ anekadā sāmya pratipādanam

original: dharmo 'rtha iva pūrṇaśrīrartho dharma iva sthitaḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ rthaḥ iva pūrṇa śrīḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iva sthitaḥ

original: kāmastāviva tau kāma iva rudranareśvare // ViPrud_8.7 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ tau iva tau kāmaḥ iva rudra nareśvare

original: atra dharmo 'rtha iva artho dharma ivetyanekadā ivaśabdadvayena dharmārthakāmānāṃ sādṛśyaṃ pratipādyata ityupameyopamā /
analyzed: atra dharmaḥ rthaḥ iva arthaḥ dharmaḥ iva iti anekadā iva śabda dvayena dharma artha kāmānām sādṛśyam pratipādyate iti upameyopamā
vācyam iti anena pratīyamāna aupamyānām rūpaka saṃdeha bhrāntimat ullekha apahnava tulyayogitā dīpaka prativastūpamā dṛṣṭānta sahokti vyatireka nidarśanānām
vailakṣaṇyam tathā hi
akhaṇḍa vikrama uddāmaḥ grasate rāja maṇḍalam

original: atra maṇḍalāgravidhuṃtudayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyānyathānupapattyā sādṛśyaṃ lakṣyata iti nopamā ;
analyzed: atra maṇḍala agra vidhuṃtudayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya anyathā anupapattyā sādṛśyam lakṣyate iti na upamā
kim tu rūpaka alaṅkāraḥ
kim eṣa navamaḥ haritpatiḥ amanda saṃpad padam
kim eṣa daśamaḥ prajāpatiḥ a pūrva sarga kramaḥ
kim eṣa hariḥ urvarā uddharaṇa cuñcuḥ ekādaśaḥ

original: cirāditi vitarkyate jagati kākatīndro janaiḥ // ViPrud_8.9 //
analyzed: cirāt iti vitarkyate jagati kākatīndraḥ janaiḥ

original: atra kākatīśvarasya haritpatiprabhṛtīnāṃ ca parasparābhedapratīteḥ saṃdehanibandhanānyathānupapattyā sādṛśyamākṣipyate;
analyzed: atra kākatīśvarasya haritpati prabhṛtīnām ca paraspara abheda pratīteḥ saṃdeha nibandhana anyathā anupapattyā sādṛśyam ākṣipyate
tatas saṃdeha alaṃkāraḥ
kākatīya vibhoḥ kīrtti vibhave vyāpta rodasi

original: divāpi candrikābuddhyā cakorā yānti nirvṛtim // ViPrud_8.10 //
analyzed: divā api candrikā buddhyā cakorāḥ yānti nirvṛtim

original: atra kīrttivibhave candrikābuddhiḥ candrikāsādṛśyaṃ vinā na saṃbhavatīti sādṛśyākṣepāt bhrāntimadalaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atra kīrtti vibhave candrikā buddhiḥ candrikā sādṛśyam vinā na saṃbhavati iti sādṛśya ākṣepāt bhrāntimat alaṅkāraḥ
lakṣmī nivāsa gṛham iti akhilāḥ narendrāḥ
śaurya ati bhūmi khaniḥ iti ari vīra vargāḥ
vidyā vihāra padavī iti ca labdha varṇāḥ

original: atra nagaryāṃ tattatpadārthatāropaḥ sādṛśyādṛte na saṃbhavatīti sādṛśyakalpanādullekhālaṃkāraḥ /
analyzed: atra nagaryām tad tad padārtha tā āropaḥ sādṛśyāt ṛte na saṃbhavati iti sādṛśya kalpanāt ullekha alaṃkāraḥ
vīrarudrasya bhūpāla jaya homam vitanvataḥ
dhūma rajiḥ iyam bhāti na camū reṇuḥ utthitā

original: atrotthitāṃ camūreṇumavalokya dhūmapaṅktirityapahnavenāropaḥ sādṛśyamūla eveti sādṛśyākṣepādapahnavaḥ /
analyzed: atra utthitām camū reṇum avalokya dhūma paṅktiḥ iti apahnavena āropaḥ sādṛśya mūle eva iti sādṛśya ākṣepāt apahnavaḥ
evam tulya yogitā ādiṣu api sādṛśyasya gamya tvāt na upama āśaṅkā
atas sarvebhyaḥ sādṛśya mūlebhyaḥ vilakṣaṇā iyam upamā

original: sā prathamaṃ dvidhā - pūrṇā luptā ceti /

original: pūrvodāharaṇadvaye vadānyo nānyo 'stīti rājeti śabdābhyāṃ vitaraṇaśīlatvaṃ prajārañjakatvaṃ ca sādharmyamuktam /

original: kiṃtvaduḥ śāsanāḥ sarve yasya pratyarthipārthivāḥ // ViPrud_8.36 //

original: atra bhīmasenasya parākrama iva parākramo yasya saḥ bhīmasenaparākrama iti dharmevādyupamāluptā /

original: asādhūnāṃ vinetāraṃ guruṃ śiṣyā ivābhitaḥ // ViPrud_8.37 //

ca abhyupagatam

original: yatra sākalye satyapi kāryasyānutpattiḥ sā viśeṣoktiḥ /
