yathā
pratāparudra nṛpateḥ agre dūrāt nareśvarāḥ
avarohanti hastibhyaḥ tān āroḍhum anargalam
atra āroḍhum avarohanti iti viparīta phala prāpti artham prayatnaḥ
anyonya alaṃkāraḥ
atha anyonyam nirūpyate
asya api virodha mūla tā
tat anyonyam mithas yatra utpādya utpādaka tā bhavet
yatra parasparam kriyā dvārakam utpādya utpādaka tvam tat anyonyālaṃkāraḥ
yathā
ārohatā rudra nareśvareṇa virājate kākatirāja pīṭham

original: āruhya tenojjvalaratnabhājā rājāpi lakṣmīmadhikāṃ bibharti // ViPrud_8.164 //
analyzed: āruhya tena ujjvala ratna bhājā rājā api lakṣmīm adhikām bibharti
atra pratāpa rudra bhadrāsanayoḥ anyonya alaṃkārya tvam
viṣama alaṃkāraḥ
atha virodha mūlaḥ viṣama alaṃkāraḥ kathyate
viruddha kāryasya utpattiḥ yatra anarthasya vā bhavet
virūpa ghaṭanā ca asau viṣama alaṃkṛtiḥ tridhā
yatra kāraṇāt viruddha kāryasya utpattiḥ tat ekam viṣamam
akārya bhūtasya anarthasya utpattiḥ dvitīyam
virūpayoḥ vastunoḥ saṃghaṭane tṛtīyam
tatra prathamam yathā
rājñaḥ kākati vīra rudra nṛpateḥ khaḍgāt tamāla prabhāt
udbhūtām śarad indu kānti dhavalām kīrtti śriyam paśyatām
lokānām muravairi pāda kamalāt jātām viyat nimnagām

original: śrutvā saṃprati vismayādviramati prāptānubhāvaṃ manaḥ // ViPrud_8.166 //
analyzed: śrutvā saṃprati vismayāt viramati prāpta anubhāvam manaḥ
atra nīla varṇāt khaḍgāt indu ghavalasya yaśasaḥ samutpattiḥ
dvitīyam yathā
āstām jaya āśā ripu bhūpatīnām saṃgrāma sīmāmam upāgatānām

original: pratāparudrasya vilokanena bhraśyanti jīvaiḥ samamāyudhāni // ViPrud_8.167 //
analyzed: pratāparudrasya vilokanena bhraśyanti jīvaiḥ samam āyudhāni
atra samara udyoga phalasya na kevalam jayasya anutpattiḥ yāvat jīvita bhraṃśa rūpa anartha utpattiḥ api
tṛtīyam yathā
kva bhūpālāḥ tādṛś vibhava mahanīya prakṛtayaḥ
kva ca iyam kāntāra sthitiḥ aśiva vṛtti eka nilayā
iti prekṣaṃprekṣam vana bhuvi ripūn rudra nṛpateḥ
pratāpam ślāghante śabara pura vīrāḥ pratidiśam

original: atra mahānagaranivāsayogyānāṃ rājñāmaśivānāṃ vanapradeśānāṃ virūpāṇāṃ saṃghaṭanam /
analyzed: atra mahā nagara nivāsa yogyānām rājñām aśivānām vana pradeśānām virūpāṇām saṃghaṭanam
evam virodha garbha alaṅkārāḥ nirṇītāḥ
sama alaṅkāraḥ
adhunā viṣama vaidharmyāt sama alaṃkāraḥ nirūpyate
sā sama alaṃkṛtiḥ yoge vastunoḥ anurūpayoḥ
yatra anyonya anurūpa padārtha saṃghaṭanā kriyate sa samālaṅkāraḥ yathā
vijjāo sakalāo lacchīe samam

original: saṃghaṭiūṇa susarisaṃ hoi kaaccho saaṃ bahmā // ViPrud_8.170 //
analyzed: saṃghaṭiūṇa su sarisam hoi saam bahmā
vidyāḥ sakalāḥ lakṣmyā samam pratāparudre

original: saṃghaṭayya susadṛśaṃ bhavati kṛtārthaḥ svayaṃ brahmā //)
analyzed: saṃghaṭayya su sadṛśam bhavati kṛtārthaḥ svayam brahmā
atra pratāparudre sakala vidyānām lakṣmyāḥ ca yogaḥ
tulya yogitā alaṅkāraḥ
atha gamyamāna upamyālaṃkāra varga prastāvaḥ
prastutānām tathā anyeṣām kevalam tulya dharmataḥ

original: aupamyaṃ gamyate yatra sā matā tulyayogitā // ViPrud_8.171 //
analyzed: aupamyam gamyate yatra sā matā tulya yogitā

original: yatra kevalaprastutānāṃ kevalāprastutānāṃ vā samānadharmasaṃbandhādaupamyaṃ gamyate sā tulyayogitā /
analyzed: yatra kevala prastutānām kevala aprastutānām vā samāna dharma saṃbandhāt aupamyam gamyate sā tulyayogitā
prastutānām yathā
bhadrāsana adhyāsini rudra deve tad kīrttayaḥ tad dviṣat aṅganāḥ ca

original: anārataṃ bhrāntiviśeṣabhājaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pāṇḍuratāṃ bhajante // ViPrud_8.172 //
analyzed: anāratam bhrānti viśeṣa bhājaḥ pratikṣaṇam pāṇḍura tām bhajante
atra kīrttīnām dviṣat aṅganānām ca prākaraṇika tvam
pāṇḍura tām bhajante iti samāna dharmaḥ
a prākaraṇikānām yathā

original: mitho niḥ sāratāṃ prāptāḥ kākatīndre mahībhṛti // ViPrud_8.173 //
analyzed: mithas niḥ sāra tām prāptāḥ kākati indre mahībhṛti
atra kūrma indra prabhṛtīnām a prākaraṇika tvam
niḥ sāra tām prāptāḥ iti samāna dharmaḥ
atra gamyamāna aupamyam na vāstavam
kim tu vaivakṣikam
dīpaka alaṅkāraḥ
prasuta aprastutānām tu sāmastye tulya dharmataḥ

original: aupamyaṃ gamyate yatra dīpakaṃ tannigadyate // ViPrud_8.174 //
analyzed: aupamyam gamyate yatra dīpakam tat nigadyate

original: yatra prastutāprastutānāṃ samastānāmeva samānadharmasaṃbandhenaupamyaṃ gamyate taddīpakam /
analyzed: yatra prastuta aprastutānām samastānām eva samāna dharma saṃbandhena aupamyam gamyate tat dīpakam
tasya dharmasya ādi madhya anta gata tvena traividhyam
ādi dīpakam yathā

original: bhāi ṇaleṇa kiajuaṃ rahuuladīveṇa soriṇā tetā /
analyzed: bhāi ṇaleṇa kia juam rahuula dīveṇa soriṇā
tava jaṇiṇā kalī juam vīruddeṇa
bhāti nalena kṛta yugam raghu kula dīpena śauriṇā tretā
dvāparaḥ tapojaninā kali yugam vīrarudreṇa
atra yathā nala rāma dharmaputraiḥ kṛta tretā dvāparāḥ śobhante

original: tathā vīrarudreṇa kaliyugaṃ śobhata ityaupamyaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: tathā vīrarudreṇa kali yugam śobhate iti aupamyam gamyate
madhyadīpakam yathā
bhāīrahie jalaṇihī rāaī joṇhāe puṇṇimā caṃdo

original: suttīe kamalahavo kittīe paāvaruddo vi // ViPrud_8.176 //
analyzed: suttīe kamala havo kittīe paāvaruddhaḥ vi
bhāgīrathyāḥ jalanidhiḥ rājate jyotsnayā pūrṇimā candraḥ
śrutyā kamalabhavaḥ kīrttyā pratāparudraḥ pi

original: atra bhāgīrathyādibhiḥ samudrādayo yathā rājante tathā kīrttyā pratāparudro rājata ityaupamyaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: atra bhāgīrathī ādibhiḥ samudra ādayaḥ yathā rājante tathā kīrttyā pratāparudraḥ rājate iti aupamyam gamyate
anta dīpakam yathā
asura loam sura nāho ṇara loam vīra rudda nara nāho
phaṇi loam phaṇiṇāhaḥ rakkhai
asura lokam sura nāthaḥ nara lokam vīra rudra nara nāthaḥ
phaṇi lokam phaṇi nāthaḥ rakṣati nirupadrava udvegam
atra yathā sura loka phaṇi lokau sura nātha phaṇi nāthābhyām rakṣitau

original: tathā vīrarudreṇa naraloko rakṣita ityaupamyaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: tathā vīrarudreṇa nara lokaḥ rakṣitaḥ iti aupamyam gamyate
atha padārtha gata alaṃkāra dvaya anantaram vākya artha gatam alaṃkāra dvayam nirūpyate
yatra sāmānya nirdeśaḥ pṛthak vākya dvaye yadi

original: gamyaupamyāśritā sā syāt prativastūpamā matā // ViPrud_8.178 //
analyzed: gamya aupamya āśritā sā syāt prativastūpamā matā

original: yatra vastuprativastubhāvena sāmānyaṃ vākyadvaye nirdiśyate tena gamyaupamyā prativastūpamā /
analyzed: yatra vastu prativastu bhāvena sāmānyam vākya dvaye nirdiśyate tena gamyā aupamyā prativastūpamā
sā sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām dvividhā
prathamā yathā
manthāna acalaḥ evā ekaḥ kṣamaḥ sindhu viloḍane
pratāparudraḥ evā ekaḥ śaktaḥ śatru viloḍane

original: atra yathā samudraviloḍane manthānācalaḥ kṣamastathā śatruviloḍane pratāparudraḥ śakta ityaupamyaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: atra yathā samudra viloḍane manthāna acalaḥ kṣamaḥ tathā śatru viloḍane pratāparudraḥ śaktaḥ iti aupamyam gamyate
dvitīyā yathā
pratāparudraḥ evā ekaḥ paṭīyān jana rañjane
candrāt ṛte kṣamaḥ nā anyaḥ cakora paritoṣaṇe
atra candreṇa yathā cakora paritoṣaṇam kriyate

original: tathā vīrarudreṇa janarañjanaṃ kriyata iti vaidharmyeṇaupamyaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: tathā vīrarudreṇa jana rañjanam kriyate iti vaidharmyeṇa aupamyam gamyate
atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ
yatra vākya dvaye bimba pratibimba tayā ucyate

original: sāmānyadharmo vākyajñaiḥ sa dṛṣṭānto nigadyate // ViPrud_8.181 //
analyzed: sāmānya dharmaḥ vākya jñaiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ nigadyate
yatra bimba pratibimba bhāvena sāmānyam vākya dvaye nirdiśyate
sa dṛṣṭāntālaṃkāraḥ
saḥ pi sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām dvividhaḥ ādyaḥ yathā

original: kṣoṇīṃ bibhratu bhūbhṛtaḥ katipaye kāpi pratiṣṭhā punaḥ
analyzed: kṣoṇīm bibhratu bhūbhṛtaḥ katipaye kā api pratiṣṭhā punar
svarṇādreḥ diś adhīśa vāsa nagarī saṃdigdha kuñja śriyaḥ
rājānau jana rañjanam vidadhatām śrī vīrarudra prabhoḥ
kaḥ pi anyaḥ mahimā jagattraya dhurā dhaureya doḥ śālinaḥ
atra pratāparudrasya meroḥ ca bimba pratibimba bhāvāt aupamyam gamyate
vaidharmyeṇa yathā
kākati indra kṛpā dṛṣṭi mātrāt jāgrati saṃpadaḥ
tāvat abjāni nidrānti yāvat nā udeti bhānumān

original: atra yathā bhāsvadudayamātreṇa padmāni samunmīlanti tathā pratāparudradayāvilokanamātreṇa saṃpadaḥ saṃbhavantīti vaidharmyeṇa bimbapratibimbanam
analyzed: atra yathā bhāsvat udaya mātreṇa padmāni samunmīlanti tathā pratāpa rudra dayā vilokana mātreṇa saṃpadaḥ saṃbhavanti iti vaidharmyeṇa bimba pratibimbanam
nidarśana alaṅkāraḥ
atha gamyamāna aupamya prastāvāt nidarśana alaṃkāraḥ nirūpyate
asaṃbhavat dharma yogāt upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: pratibimbakriyā gamyā yatra sā syānnidarśanā // ViPrud_8.184 //
analyzed: pratibimba kriyā gamyā yatra sā syāt nidarśanā
yatra upamāna dharmasya upameya gata tvena nibaddhasya anvaya asaṃbhavāt tad sambandha artham bimba pratibimba karaṇam ākṣipyate
sā ekā nidarśanā
tad viparyaye dvitīyā nidarśanā
prathamā yathā
ripu timiram udasyan ratna siṃhāsana stha
vahati mahita viśva ullāsi līlām abhikhyā
m udaya śikhari cūḍā cumbinaḥ tīvrabhānoḥ
atra tīvrabhānoḥ abhikhyāyāḥ prakṛte saṃbhavāt abhikhyā sadṛśīm abhikhyām vahati iti bimba pratibimba karaṇa ākṣepaḥ
upameya dharmasya upamāne saṃbhavāt yathā
vīra rudra narendrasya yaśaḥ vaiśadya saṃpadaḥ
lakṣyante kṣīra vāra āśi līlā darpaṇa maṇḍale

original: atra yaśovaiśadyasya dugghārṇavādau asaṃbhavāt sādṛśyopagamena bimbapratibimbanaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: atra yaśaḥ vaiśadyasya duggha arṇava ādau asaṃbhavāt sādṛśya upagamena bimba pratibimbanam gamyate
kvacid niṣedha vaśāt ākṣiptayā prāptyā bimba pratibimba karaṇa ākṣepaḥ yathā
yathā
kākati indra dviṣat kāntāḥ dhāvantyaḥ prati kānanam
padbhyām muñcanti alākṣābhyām sthale rakta utpala śriyam
atra muñcanti iti niṣedhāt pūrvam raktotpala śrī prāptiḥ ākṣiptā
vyatireka alaṅkāraḥ
atha vyatirekaḥ
bheda pradhāna sādharmyam upamāna upameyayoḥ
ādhikya alpa tva kathanāt vyatirekaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: yatropamānādupameyasyādhikyena nyūnatvena vā pratipādanena bhedapradhānaṃ sādharmyamupagamyate sa vyatirekālaṃkāraḥ / yathā---
analyzed: yatra upamānāt upameyasya ādhikyena nyūna tvena vā pratipādanena bheda pradhānam sādharmyam upagamyate sa vyatirekālaṃkāraḥ yathā

original: dinakṛti kumudairdhṛto na rāgaḥ śaśini parāñci paraṃ saroruhāṇi /
analyzed: dinakṛti kumudaiḥ dhṛtaḥ na rāgaḥ śaśini parāñci param saroruhāṇi
kuvalaya kamala ādṛta prakāśaḥ prabhavati viśva suhṛd pratāpa rudraḥ

original: atra raviśaśinorasaṃbhavena sarvapriyaṃkaratvenopameyabhūtasya pratāparudrasyādhikyaṃ kuvalayakamalādṛtaprakāśa ityuktamiti śleṣasamutthāpito  #
analyzed: atra ravi śaśinoḥ asaṃbhavena sarva priyaṃkara tvena upameya bhūtasya pratāparudrasya ādhikyam kuvalaya kamala ādṛta prakāśaḥ iti uktam iti śleṣa samutthāpitaḥ
vyatirekaḥ
atha śleṣālaṅkāraḥ nirūpyate
prakṛta aprakṛta ubhaya gatam uktam ced śabda mātra sādharmyam
śleṣaḥ yam śliṣṭa tvam sarvatra ādya dvaye na antye
yatra kevala prakṛtayoḥ kevala aprakṛtayoḥ ca śleṣaḥ kathyate
tatra
prakṛta aprakṛta viṣaye ntya bhede viśeṣaṇa mātra śliṣṭa tā
viśeṣyayoḥ api śliṣṭa tve śabda śakti mūla dhvani prasaṅgāt
kevala prakṛtayoḥ kevala aprakṛtayoḥ ca eka śabda gocara tve tu na dhvani śaṅkā
atra artha dvaya pratipādane prastuta tvena prastuta tvena vā vaimagya abhāvāt abhidhā eva samarthā
prastuta aprastuta viṣaye tu abhidhāyāḥ prastuta eka paratantra tvāt aprastuta artha pratipattiḥ vyañjana vyāpāra āyattā eva
tathā ca uktam kāvyaprakāśe
aneka arthasya śabdasya vācaka tve niyantrite
saṃyoga ādyaiḥ avācya artha dhī kṛt vyāpṛtiḥ añjanam iti
tat evam tridhā śleṣaḥ
tatra kevala prākaraṇikayoḥ yathā
rājñaḥ pūjā vidhim dhatte sakalaḥ mādhave tithiḥ
nīlakaṇṭha kalāpa aṅke sphurat abja maṇi tviṣi
atra pūjā viṣaya tayā hariharayoḥ prākaraṇika tvam
a prākaraṇikayoḥ yathā
sadṛśaḥ kākati indraḥ yam mahā kula mahībhṛtām
śiraḥ gṛhīta sat mārga sphurat kaṭaka saṃpadām
atra mahā kulānām hariścandra prabhṛtīnām kula parvatānām ca upamāna tvena a prākaraṇika tvam
prākaraṇika aprākaraṇikayoḥ yathā
vijita ari puro
mūrtau vilasat sarva maṅgalaḥ

original: rājamauliḥ pratāpāṅkarudro rudra iva sthitaḥ // ViPrud_8.193 //
analyzed: rājamauliḥ pratāpa aṅka rudraḥ rudraḥ iva sthitaḥ
atra pratāpa rudra rudrayoḥ prākaraṇika a prākaraṇika tvam
parikara alaṅkāraḥ
viśeṣaṇa vaicitrya mūla tvāt parikaraḥ ucyate
yatra abhiprāya garbhā syāt viśeṣaṇa paramparā
tatra abhiprāya viduṣām asau parikaraḥ mataḥ

original: yatra viśeṣaṇāni sābhiprāyāṇi nibadhyante sa parikarālaṃkāraḥ / yathā---
analyzed: yatra viśeṣaṇāni sa abhiprāyāṇi nibadhyante sa parikara alaṃkāraḥ yathā
rājñaḥ yādava vaṃśa pārthiva maṇeḥ prakhyāta śaurya śriyaḥ
tu aṅgat tuṅga turaṅga sainya mahataḥ māna eka vittasya ca
sadyas rudra narendra nāyaka camū nāthena kena api adhi
kṣiptasya ācaritāni sevaṇa pateḥ jānāti sā gautamī
atra rājñaḥ iti evamādi viśeṣaṇāni utprāsa garbhāṇi
ākṣepa alaṅkāraḥ
atha ākṣepa alaṃkāraḥ
viśeṣa bodhāya uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā bhavet
niṣedha ābhāsa kathanam ākṣepaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ
yatra viśeṣa pratipatti artham ukta vakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayoḥ niṣedha ābhāsaḥ kathyate
saḥ ākṣepa alaṃkāraḥ

original: uktaviṣaye vastu vā kathanaṃ vā niṣidhyate /
analyzed: ukta viṣaye vastu vā kathanam vā niṣidhyate
vakṣyamāṇa viṣaye kathanam eva niṣidhyate
tatra api sāmānya rūpeṇa pratijñāya viśeṣa rūpeṇa niṣedhaḥ
aṃśa uktau aṃśa antarasya vā niṣedhaḥ
evam caturvidhaḥ yama ākṣepaḥ
krameṇa eṣām udāharaṇāni
narendra maule
na vayam tava saṃdeśa hāriṇaḥ
jagatkuṭumbinaḥ kaścid na śatruḥ iti kathyate

original: atra rājasandhivigrahakāriṇāmuktau na vayaṃ saṃdeśahāriṇa iti vastuniṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: atra rāja sandhi vigraha kāriṇām uktau na vayam saṃdeśa hāriṇaḥ iti vastu niṣedhaḥ
sa ca anupapadyamānaḥ saṃdhi vigraha kāla ucita kaitava vacana parihāreṇa tattvavādi tve paryavasitaḥ
sarva jagat pālakasya tava śatru bhāvena nā ālokanīyāḥ rājānaḥ
kim tu bhṛtya rūpeṇa saṃrakṣaṇīyāḥ iti evamādi viśeṣam ākṣipati
kathana niṣedhaḥ yathā
vayam aśaraṇāḥ iti eṣā uktiḥ katham ghaṭate jagat
tritaya śaraṇe trāyasva asmān iti sphuṭam ajña tā
sakala janatā rakṣā dakṣe tvayi praṇatāḥ iti
tribhuvana namaskārye siddham pratāpa mahīpate
atra vayam aśaraṇāḥ iti evamādi ukti kathana niṣedhāḥ dā
bhāsa rūpāt avaśya paripālanīya tva ādi viśeṣaḥ pratīyate
vakṣyamāṇa viṣaye sāmānyam pratijñāya kathana niṣedhaḥ yathā
vijñāpayāmaḥ te kiṃcid kākatīya kula udvaha

original: vijñāpyate kimathavā sarvajñe rakṣake tvayi // ViPrud_8.199 //
analyzed: vijñāpyate kim athavā sarvajñe rakṣake tvayi
atra vijñāpayāma

original: iti sāmānyaṃ pratijñāya kathananiṣedhābhāsāt sarvathā vayaṃ rakṣaṇīyā iti viśeṣa ākṣipyate /
analyzed: iti sāmānyam pratijñāya kathana niṣedha ābhāsāt sarvathā vayam rakṣaṇīyāḥ iti viśeṣaḥ ākṣipyate
aṃśa uktau aṃśa antarasya niṣedhaḥ yathā
pratāparudraḥ svayam iddha tejāḥ daivam ca tat vikrama datta hastam

original: yūyaṃ ca tūlopamasārabhājastad yuktamevaṃ yadi vā kimuktaiḥ // ViPrud_8.200 //
analyzed: yūyam ca tūla upama sāra bhājaḥ tat yuktam evam yadi vā kim uktaiḥ
atra pratāparudraḥ mahīyān

original: yūyamalpā ityaṃśoktyā yadi vā kimuktairityaṃśāntaraniṣedhābhāsena sarvathā praṇāmaiḥ prasādanīyo 'yam,
analyzed: yūyam alpāḥ iti aṃśa uktyā yadi vā kim uktaiḥ iti aṃśa antara niṣedha ābhāsena sarvathā praṇāmaiḥ prasādanīyaḥ yam

original: na tu prātipakṣyamavalambanīyaṃ yuṣmābhiriti śatrustrīvacanabhaṅgyā viśeṣa ākṣipyate /
analyzed: na tu prātipakṣyam avalambanīyam yuṣmābhiḥ iti śatru strī vacana bhaṅgyā viśeṣaḥ ākṣipyate
samāna artha tayā aniṣṭa vidhi ābhāsaḥ pi ākṣepaḥ iti abhyupagamyate

original: yathā ca iṣṭaniṣedhasyānupapadyamānatayā ābhāsatvaṃ tathā aniṣṭavidherapyanupapadyamānatayā ābhāsatvam / yathā---
analyzed: yathā ca iṣṭa niṣedhasya anupapadyamāna tayā ābhāsa tvam tathā aniṣṭa vidheḥ api anupapadyamāna tayā ābhāsa tvam yathā

original: nātha / pratāparudrasya sevāṃ tyajasi cet tyaja /
analyzed: nātha pratāparudrasya sevām tyajasi ced tyaja
araṇya gṛha medhinyāḥ rītiḥ abhyasyate mayā
atrā aniṣṭa bhūtam pratāparudra pāda sevā tyajanam tat ripu kāminyā vidhīyate
sa vidhiḥ anupapadyamānaḥ ābhāse paryavasyati

original: araṇyagṛhamedhinyā rītirabhyasyata ityanena vidhyābhāsa eva upabṛṃhitaḥ /
analyzed: araṇya gṛha medhinyāḥ rītiḥ abhyasyate iti anena vidhi ābhāsaḥ eva upabṛṃhitaḥ
vyāja stuti alaṅkāraḥ
atha gamya prastāvāt vyājastutiḥ ucyate
nindayā vācyayā yatra stutiḥ evā avagamyate

original: stutyā vā gamyate nindā vyājastutirasau matā // ViPrud_8.203 //
analyzed: stutyā vā gamyate nindā vyāja stutiḥ asau matā
yatra nindā kathana mukhena stutiḥ gamyate ekā sā

original: yatra stutimukhena nindā gamyate---sā dvitīyā vyājastutiḥ /
analyzed: yatra stuti mukhena nindā gamyate sā dvitīyā vyāja stutiḥ
krameṇa yathā
kākatīya vibhoḥ kīrttyā kim vā adya dhavalīkṛtam
yat tadīya ari vaktreṣu dṛśyate kālimā mahān
stutyā nindā yathā
pratāparudra nṛpateḥ aho sāhasikāḥ dviṣaḥ
yat viśanti udadhīn śailān ārohanti samantataḥ
aprastuta praśaṃsā alaṅkāraḥ
atha gamya tva prastāvāt aprastuta praśaṃsā ucyate
aprastutasya kathanāt prastutam yatra gamyate
aprastuta praśaṃsā iyam sārūpya ādi niyantritā

original: yatra sārūpyeṇa sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kāryakāraṇabhāvena cāprastutakathanāt prastutapratītistatrāprastutapraśaṃsā /
analyzed: yatra sārūpyeṇa sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena kārya kāraṇa bhāvena ca aprastuta kathanāt prastuta pratītiḥ tatra aprastuta praśaṃsā
aprastutāt prastuta pratītiḥ iti anena samāsokteḥ vyāvṛttiḥ
na ca kāryāt kāraṇa pratītau anumāna āvirbhāva śaṅkā
anumāna alaṃkāre pratyāyya pratyāyakayoḥ dvayoḥ api prākaraṇika tva abhyupagamāt
anena paryāya uktasya vyāvṛttiḥ api
na ca ayam dhvaniḥ
pratīyamānasya vācya siddhi aṅga tvāt
tatra sārūpyeṇa yathā
āśāsu praśamita vāsanā udayebhyaḥ kim labdham bhramara gaṇaiḥ jarat tarubhyaḥ
punnāgaḥ nava nava saurabha prasūnaiḥ āmodam diśati vivāsam ārabhadhvam

original: atra bhramaravṛttāntenāprastutena sarvān asaṃpūrṇavibhavān urvīśvarān vihāya sakalaguṇaparipūrṇaḥ
analyzed: atra bhramara vṛttāntena aprastutena sarvān asaṃpūrṇa vibhavān urvī īśvarān vihāya sakala guṇa paripūrṇaḥ

original: sarvajanānandī pratāparudra eka eva sarveṣāṃ viduṣāṃ sevya iti prastutaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: sarva jana ānandī pratāparudraḥ ekaḥ eva sarveṣām viduṣām sevyaḥ iti prastutam pratīyate
sāmānyāt viśeṣa pratītiḥ yathā
yaśasvinī padma bhavasya sṛṣṭiḥ utpādayitrī nṛpa śekharāṇām
tad pālanāt lālana bhāgya yogyaḥ jātaḥ cirāt madhyamalokaḥ eṣaḥ
atra pratāparudrasya guṇa mahattve prastute sāmānyam abhihitam
viśeṣāt sāmānya pratipattiḥ yathā

original: daṭṭhumaṇā vi ṇa pekkhai ṇa bhaṇai vattuṃ sakoduhalaā vi /
analyzed: daṭṭhu maṇā vi na pekkhai ṇa bhaṇai vattum sa koduhalaā vi

original: parisāsaā vi ṇa ppasai vaṇiāe kīrisī siṭṭī // ViPrud_8.209 //
analyzed: parisāsaā vi na ppasai vaṇiāe kīrisī siṭṭī

original: (draṣṭumanā api na paśyati na bhaṇati vaktuṃ sakautūhalāpi /
analyzed: draṣṭu manāḥ api na paśyati na bhaṇati vaktum sa kautūhalā api

original: sparśāśayāpi na spṛśati vanitāyāḥ kīdṛśī sṛṣṭiḥ //)
analyzed: sparśa āśayā api na spṛśati vanitāyāḥ kīdṛśī sṛṣṭiḥ

original: atra mugdhānāṃ navasaṃgame mahatī lajjeti sāmānye prastute viśeṣo 'bhihitaḥ /
analyzed: atra mugdhānām nava saṃgame mahatī lajjā iti sāmānye prastute viśeṣaḥ bhihitaḥ
kāryāt kāraṇa pratītiḥ yathā

original: gādhā ivārṇavā jātā nīcā iva mahādrayaḥ /
analyzed: gādhāḥ iva arṇavāḥ jātāḥ nīcāḥ iva mahā adrayaḥ
mahīm avatarati asmin kākatīya kula īśvare

original: atrārṇavādīnāṃ gādhatvādibhiḥ kāryabhūtairaprastutaiḥ kāraṇabhūtaṃ pratāparudragāmbhīryādi pratīyate /
analyzed: atra arṇava ādīnām gādha tva ādibhiḥ kārya bhūtaiḥ aprastutaiḥ kāraṇa bhūtam pratāpa rudra gāmbhīrya ādi pratīyate
kāraṇāt kārya pratītiḥ yathā

original: jātā mayi kṛpādṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ vā vismayase sakhe // ViPrud_8.211 //
analyzed: jātā mayi kṛpā dṛṣṭiḥ kim vā vismayase sakhe

original: atra kathamīdṛśamahāvibhavabhājanamadhunā bhavasīti kāryaṃ pṛcchate savismayāya suhṛde kāraṇabhūtā pratāparudrakṛpādṛṣṭirabhihitā /
analyzed: atra katham īdṛśa mahā vibhava bhājanam adhunā bhavasi iti kāryam pṛcchate sa vismayāya suhṛde kāraṇa bhūtā pratāparudra kṛpā dṛṣṭiḥ abhihitā
vācya saṃbhāva saṃbhava ubhaya rūpa tayā yathāsaṃbhavam bhedāḥ svayam draṣṭavyāḥ
gamya tva prastāvāt paryāya uktam ucyate
kāraṇam gamyate yatra prastutāt kārya varṇanāt
prastuta tvena saṃbaddham tat paryāyoktam ucyate

original: yatra prastutasyaiva kāryasya varṇanāt prastutameva kāraṇaṃ gamyate,
analyzed: yatra prastutasya eva kāryasya varṇanāt prastutam eva kāraṇam gamyate
tat paryāya uktam yathā
prakṣālayanti gātrāṇi kākatīya camū carāḥ

original: atra ripunagarīdīrghikāvārivihāreṇa pratāparudracamūcarakartṛkeṇa kāryabhūtena samaraprārambha eva svapurāṇi vihāya palāyitā pratinṛpāḥ iti  #
analyzed: atra ripu nagarī dīrghikā vāri vihāreṇa pratāparudra camū cara kartṛkeṇa kārya bhūtena samara prārambhe eva sva purāṇi vihāya palāyitā prati nṛpāḥ iti
kāraṇam pratīyate
pratīpa alaṅkāraḥ
atha pratīpam
ākṣepaḥ upamānasya kaimarthakyena kathyate
yat vā upameya bhāvaḥ syāt tat pratīpam udāhṛtam

tat ekam pratīpam
yatra upamānasya upameya tvam kalpyate
tat dvitīyam
ādyam yathā
kīrttau pratāparudrasya vilasantyām digantare
kimartham udayati eṣa nirlajjaḥ śaśalāñchanaḥ
dvitīyam yathā
kākatīya kule lakṣmīpatiḥ eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
anena katham alpa jñaiḥ sumeruḥ upamīyate
atha tarka nyāya mūla alaṃkārāḥ nirūpyante
sādhya sādhana nirdeśe tu anumānam udīryate

rajaḥ dhūmaḥ senā vyatikara bhavaḥ yat prasarati

atha kāvyaliṅgam

original: yatra heturvākyagatatvena padagatatvena vā pratipādyate tat kāvyaliṅgam /
analyzed: yatra hetuḥ vākya gata tvena pada gata tvena vā pratipādyate tat kāvya liṅgam
yathā
pratāparudraḥ iti eṣā kā api pañcākṣarī śubhā

original: hṛdi yāṃ bibhrato bhūpā vaśīkurvanti saṃpadaḥ // ViPrud_8.220 //
analyzed: hṛdi yām bibhrataḥ bhūpāḥ vaśīkurvanti saṃpadaḥ
atra vākya artha gataḥ hetuḥ
padārtha gataḥ yathā
mlānā api bhūbhṛtām phāla lipiḥ ucchvasitā punar

original: atra pūrvaṃ parimlānāyā bhūpālaphālalipeḥ punarucchvāse pratāparudranarendracaraṇanakhacandrikāsecanaṃ hetuḥ /
analyzed: atra pūrvam parimlānāyāḥ bhūpāla phāla lipeḥ punar ucchvāse pratāparudra narendra caraṇa nakha candrikā secanam hetuḥ
tasya viśeṣaṇa gata tvāt padārtha gata tva uktiḥ
artha antaranyāsa alaṅkāraḥ
atha artha antara nyāsaḥ
kārya kāraṇa sāmānya viśeṣāṇām parasparam
samarthanam yatra saḥ ṛthāntaranyāsaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena vā prakṛta samarthanam kriyate
saḥ ṛtha antara nyāsaḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvena yathā
bhūpāḥ pratāparudrasya natāḥ bhavata na unnatāḥ
unnatān namayati eṣa natān unnamayati api
atra phala rūpeṇa aunnatyena namra tva kāraṇam samarthitam
sāmānyāt viśeṣa samarthanam yathā
udvejitāḥ rudra nareśvarasya raṇa apadānaiḥ pratipakṣa bhūpāḥ

original: bibhratyamī citramacetanebhyo bhītasya sarvaṃ bhayakāri nūnam // ViPrud_8.224 //
analyzed: bibhrati amī citram acetanebhyaḥ bhītasya sarvam bhaya kāri nūnam

original: atra bhītasya sarvaṃ bhayakārīti sāmānyamacetanebhyo ripubhūpā bibhyatīti viśeṣaṃ samarthayati /
analyzed: atra bhītasya sarvam bhaya kāri iti sāmānyam acetanebhyaḥ ripu bhūpāḥ bibhyati iti viśeṣam samarthayati
viśeṣāt sāmānya samarthanam yathā
duṣṭaḥ u pi mahatām saṃgāt bhavati eva hi sat janaḥ
pratāparudram abhyetya kaliḥ kṛta yugāyate

original: atra pratāparudrasaṃgatimahimnā kaliḥ kṛtayugasadṛśa iti viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasamarthanam /

atas prakāra trayam artha antaranyāsasya
yathāsaṃkhyā alaṅkāraḥ

ekasya vastunaḥ bhāvāt yatra vastu anyat āpatet
kaimutya nyāyataḥ sā syāt arthāpattiḥ alaṃkriyā

original: yatra kasyacidarthasya niṣpattau tatsamānanyāyāt kaimutyenārthāntaramāpatati so 'rthāpattiralaṃkāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra kasyacid arthasya niṣpattau tad samāna nyāyāt kaimutyena artha antaram āpatati saḥ ṛthāpattiḥ alaṃkāraḥ
na ca atra anumāna śaṅkā
kaimutya nyāya saṃbandha rūpa tvāt yathā

api ca
trailokya sāraḥ suvarṇa śailaḥ pratāparudreṇa nṛpeṇa tulyam

original: tulāṃ samāroḍhumapūrṇa eva mahībhṛtāṃ kā gaṇanetareṣām // ViPrud_8.230 //
analyzed: tulām samāroḍhum apūrṇaḥ eva mahībhṛtām kā gaṇanā itareṣām

parisaṃkhyā alaṅkāraḥ
atha parisaṃkhyā
ekasya vastunaḥ prāptau anekatra ekadā yadi

original: ekatra niyamaḥ sā hi parisaṃkhyā nigadyate // ViPrud_8.231 //
analyzed: ekatra niyamaḥ sā hi parisaṃkhyā nigadyate
vastu yugapad anekatra saṃbhāvyamānam ekatra eva niyamyate

praśna pūrvikā
tad anyathā ca iti
tayoḥ dvarjayoḥ varjanīyasya śābda tva artha tvābhyām dvaividhye cāturvidhyam
tatra śābda varjanīyā praśna pūrvikā yathā

original: kiṃ maṇḍanaṃ trilokyāḥ kākatitilako na hāṭakakṣitibhṛt /
analyzed: kim maṇḍanam trilokyāḥ kākati tilakaḥ na hāṭaka kṣitibhṛt

original: stotavyaḥ kaḥ sudhiyāṃ rudranarendro na mandaraḥ kṣitibhṛt // ViPrud_8.232 //
analyzed: stotavyaḥ kaḥ sudhiyām rudra narendraḥ na mandaraḥ kṣitibhṛt

vyasanam aniśam nīti śāstre na ca akṣe

original: vidyābhyāse na ca parijane rudradevasya rājñaḥ // ViPrud_8.234 //

original: atra pratāparudro yadā prabhavati tadārabhya pūrṇadharmapratiṣṭhā mahī /
analyzed: atra pratāparudraḥ yadā prabhavati tat ārabhya pūrṇa dharma pratiṣṭhā mahī

original: kimadhunā pṛcchasītyuttarāt kiṃ pratāparudrarājye dharmapratipālanamasti kiṃ sukhino bhūsurā ityunnīyate praśnaḥ /

original: bhūpālāḥ kriyatāṃ mūrdhnāṃ dhanuṣāṃ vā vinamratā /

original: atra pratāparudre prabhavati rājñāṃ saṃdhivigrahābhyāṃ tulyabalapramāṇābhyāṃ śironamanadhanurnamane yugapadeva prāpte,
analyzed: atra pratāparudre prabhavati rājñām saṃdhi vigrahābhyām tulya bala pramāṇābhyām śiraḥ namana dhanuḥ namane yugapad eva prāpte

original: yatra guṇānāṃ vaimalyādīnāṃ kriyāṇāṃ ca darśanādīnāṃ yugapadavasthānaṃ tatra samuccayālaṃkāraḥ / yathā---
analyzed: yatra guṇānām vaimalya ādīnām kriyāṇām ca darśana ādīnām yugapad avasthānam tatra samuccaya alaṃkāraḥ yathā
pratāparudra nṛpatau bhadrāsanam upeyuṣi

original: satāṃ prasannaṃ hṛdayamasatāṃ kaluṣaṃ manaḥ // ViPrud_8.243 //
analyzed: satām prasannam hṛdayam asatām kaluṣam manaḥ
kriyāsamuccayaḥ yathā

original: pecchai imaṃ ṇarindo pavisai maaṇo a galai māṇo a /
analyzed: pecchai imam narindo pavisai maaṇaḥ a galai māṇaḥ a

original: ghuṇṇai maṇo a suṇṇaṃ kiṃ edaṃ uvaha sahiāo // ViPrud_8.244 //
analyzed: ghuṇṇai maṇaḥ a suṇṇam kim ā idam sahiāaḥ

original: (prekṣate imāṃ narendraḥ praviśati madanaśca galati mānaśca /

original: ghūrṇate manaśca śūnyaṃ kimetat paśyata sakhyaḥ //)
analyzed: ghūrṇate manaḥ ca śūnyam kim etat paśyata sakhyaḥ
ete bhinna viṣaya tve udāharaṇe

sevā artham cirayatsu kākatipure bhūpeṣu tad yoṣitaḥ

original: dvāraṃ yānti vilokayanti purato niḥ śvāsamātanvate
analyzed: dvāram yānti vilokayanti puratas niḥ śvāsam ātanvate

guṇa kriyā sāmastyena yathā

analyzed: kampam bhrāmyati sarvatas prativanam pratyarthi bhūbhṛt gaṇaḥ
dvitīyaḥ samuccayaḥ
khalekapota nyāyena bahūnām kārya sādhane

original: kāraṇānāṃ samudyogaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ samuccayaḥ // ViPrud_8.247 //

yatra ekam kāryam
sādhayitum ahamahamikayā bahūnām kāraṇānām udyamaḥ
saḥ pi samuccayaḥ eva
yugapad anekeṣām avasthānāt
yathā

original: śubhraṃ yaśaḥ śauryamahacca vṛttaṃ vidyānavadyā vimalaṃ kulaṃ ca /
analyzed: śubhram yaśaḥ śaurya mahat ca vṛttam vidyā anavadyā vimalam kulam ca
pratāparudrasya nareśvarasya lokottarām rītim udañcayanti

original: atra yaśaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ lokottararītisaṃpādane pratyekaṃ hetutve 'pi yugapatkhalekapotanyāyena saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atra yaśaḥ prabhṛtīnām lokottara rīti saṃpādane pratyekam hetu tve pi yugapad khalekapota nyāyena saṃbandhaḥ
samādhi alaṅkāraḥ
atha samādhiḥ ucyate
ekasmin kāraṇe kārya sādhane parāpatet
kākatālīya nayataḥ sa samādhiḥ udīryate

original: yatraikasmin kāraṇe kāryasādhanāya pravṛtte kākatālīyatayānyat kāraṇamāgatya tatkāryaṃ sukaraṃ karoti sa samādhyalaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra ekasmin kāraṇe kārya sādhanāya pravṛtte kākatālīya tayā anyat kāraṇam āgatya tat kāryam sukaram karoti sa samādhi alaṅkāraḥ
raṇa aṅgaṇe rudra narendra roṣa śamāya rājñām vihita stutīnām

original: vaktreṣu yadvāyuvaśāt patanti tṛṇāni devasya sa pakṣapātaḥ // ViPrud_8.250 //
analyzed: vaktreṣu yat vāyu vaśāt patanti tṛṇāni devasya sa pakṣapātaḥ

original: atra pratāparudranarendrakrodhaśāntyarthaṃ raṇāgre prakrāntastutīnāṃ rājñāṃ vaktreṣu vāyuvaśāt kākatālīyatayā patitaistṛṇaiḥ kopaśāntilakṣaṇakāryasya  #
analyzed: atra pratāpa rudra narendra krodha śānti artham raṇa agre prakrānta stutīnām rājñām vaktreṣu vāyu vaśāt kākatālīya tayā patitaiḥ tṛṇaiḥ kopa śānti lakṣaṇa kāryasya
sukara tvam
bhāvika alaṅkāraḥ
atha loka nyāya mūla alaṃkārāḥ nirūpyante
atīta anāgate yatra pratyakṣe iva lakṣite
ati adbhuta artha kathanāt bhāvikam tat udāhṛtam

original: yatrādbhutacaritopavarṇanād bhūtabhāvinorvastunoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ bhavati sa bhāvikālaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra adbhuta carita upavarṇanāt bhūta bhāvinoḥ vastunoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam bhavati sa bhāvikālaṅkāraḥ
na ca bhūta bhāvinoḥ pratyakṣa vat avabhāsaḥ viruddhaḥ
ati adbhuta vastu varṇanayā bhāvukānām hṛdi bhāvanā udayāt
tathā ca bhāvanāyāḥ punar
punar cetasi nidarśanāt pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam ghaṭate eva
yathā pānthasya kāminī bhāvanayā tasyāḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam
na ca iyam svabhāva uktiḥ
tasyām vastu svabhāvasya yathāvat varṇanayā pratyakṣāyamāṇa tā
iha tu ati adbhuta tvena
na api rasavat ādi alaṅkāraḥ
tatra vibhāva ādi anusaṃdhānena eva rasa ādeḥ bhāvya tvam
na tu ati adbhuta tvena
na ca iyam utprekṣā
atīta anāgatayoḥ pratyakṣa tvena adhyavasāya abhāvāt
na ca ayam bhrāntimat alaṅkāraḥ
bhāvanāyāḥ a bhrānti rūpa tvāt
atas sarva uttīrṇaḥ eva ayam alaṅkāraḥ yathā
dhvaja agre kākati indrasya bhāti kroḍa ākṛtiḥ hariḥ
mṛd binduḥ iva daṃṣṭra agre yasya alakṣyata medinī

original: atrāṣṭādaśadvīpayuktāyā medinyā daṃṣṭrāgre mṛdbindurūpateti atyadbhutavarṇanayā tathāvidhabhāvanāyāṃ pratyakṣavat pratītisaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: atra aṣṭādaśa dvīpa yuktāyāḥ medinyāḥ daṃṣṭra agre mṛd bindu rūpa tā iti ati adbhuta varṇanayā tathāvidha bhāvanāyām pratyakṣa vat pratīti saṃbhavaḥ
atha pratyanīka alaṅkāraḥ pratipādyate
balinaḥ pratipakṣasya pratīkāre su duṣkare
yaḥ tadīya tiraskāraḥ pratyanīkam tat ucyate

original: yatra prabalasya pratipakṣasya pratīkārāsāmarthyāt tadīyatiraskāro bhavati tat pratyanīkam / yathā---
analyzed: yatra prabalasya pratipakṣasya pratīkāra asāmarthyāt tadīya tiraskāraḥ bhavati tat pratyanīkam yathā
tat gabhīrim asanābhim ajasram bādhate nidhim apām bahis antar
atra sādṛśya hetukam tadīya tvam iti alaṃkāra tvam
vyāghāta alaṅkāraḥ
atha vyāghātaḥ

original: yena yat sādhitaṃ vastu tenaiva kriyate 'nyathā /
analyzed: yena yat sādhitam vastu tena eva kriyate nyathā

original: anyena tadalaṃkāro vyāghātā iti kathyate // ViPrud_8.255 //
analyzed: anyena tad alaṃkāraḥ vyāghātāḥ iti kathyate

original: yadvastu yena kenacit kartrā yena sādhanena sādhitaṃ,
analyzed: yat vastu yena kenacid kartrā yena sādhanena sādhitam

original: tadvastu tenaiva sādhanenānyena kartrā yadanyathā kriyate sa vyāghātaḥ / yathā---
analyzed: tat vastu tena eva sādhanena anyena kartrā yat anyathā kriyate sa vyāghātaḥ yathā
kākatīya abhijātaḥ yam na abhijāta adhika sthitiḥ
dorbhyām labdha udayān bhūpān tābhyām anudayān sṛjan
atha loka nyāya mūla alaṅkāra nirūpaṇa prastāvāt paryāyālaṃkāraḥ nirūpyate
krameṇa ekam anekasmin ādhāre vartate yadi
ekasmin athavā anekam paryāya alaṅkṛtiḥ matā

original: yatra kramādekamādheyamanekasminnādhāre vartate sa ekaḥ paryāyaḥ /
analyzed: yatra kramāt ekam ādheyam anekasmin ādhāre vartate saḥ ekaḥ paryāyaḥ
na ca atra viśeṣa alaṃkāraḥ
tatra ekasya an ekatra yugapad vartanam
atra krameṇa
tathā ekasmin ādhāre na ekam ādheyam vartate sa dvitīyaḥ paryāyaḥ
na ca atra samuccaya alaṃkāraḥ
tatra api ekatra anekeṣām yugapad vartanam
atra krameṇa yathā
daṃṣṭrāyām kuhanākiṭeḥ bhagavataḥ devasya śaureḥ purā
paścāt mastaka maṇḍale phaṇabhṛtaḥ pātāla loka īśituḥ
adyā urvīpati śekharasya mahataḥ śrī kākatīya prabhoḥ
bāhau sarva dhurīṇa sāra mahite baddha utsavā medīnī
atra ekasyāḥ medinyāḥ kramāt anekatra vartanam dvitīyaḥ
yeṣām mukhe nija vadhū savidhe nṛpāṇām
śaurya uktayaḥ samabhavan abhimāna garbhāḥ
teṣām pratāpa nṛpa vīkṣaṇa kātarāṇām
tatra eva dīna vacanāni samudbhavanti
sūkṣma alaṅkāraḥ
atha sūkṣmālaṅkāraḥ nirūpyate
asaṃlakṣita sūkṣma artha prakāśaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ucyate
vidagdha mātra jñeyasya arthasya yatra ākāra iṅgitābhyām prakāśanam sa sūkṣmālaṅkāraḥ
yathā
guru aṇasa vihammi ṇara iṃda pesiām
sa hāsam katthūri vilevaṇam kuṇai
guru jana savidhe vadhūḥ dṛṣṭvā narendra preṣitām dūtīm
sarva aṅgeṣu sa hāsam kastūrī vilepanam karoti

original: atra kastūrīvilepanena timirasamayaḥ saṃketakāla iti prakāśitam
analyzed: atra kastūrī vilepanena timira samayaḥ saṃketa kālaḥ iti prakāśitam
udātta alaṃkāraḥ
atha udātta alaṃkāraḥ kathyate
tasya api loka nyāya mūla tā eva ānantarya kāraṇam

original: tadudāttaṃ bhaved yatra samṛddhaṃ vastu varṇyate // ViPrud_8.262 //
analyzed: tat udāttam bhavet yatra samṛddham vastu varṇyate
yatra mahā samṛddhi śālinaḥ vastunaḥ varṇanam kriyate
tatra udātta alaṅkāraḥ
yathā
ramyām eka śilā abhidāna nagarīm āsedivāṃsaḥ budhāḥ
sauvarṇeṣu gṛheṣu ratna racita dvās toraṇeṣu sthitāḥ
āruhya aṅgaṇa medinīṣu kalabhān krīḍā utsukān arbhakān
modante yat avekṣya rudra nṛpateḥ tat tyāga līlāyitam
atha samāna nyāyāt parivṛttiḥ nirūpyate
sama nyūna adhikānām ca yadā vinimayaḥ bhavet
sākam sama adhika nyūnaiḥ parivṛttiḥ asau matā
sama nyūna adhikānām sama adhika nyūnaiḥ vinimayaḥ parivṛttiḥ
samena sama parivṛttiḥ
nyūnena adhika parivṛttiḥ
adhikena nyūna parivṛttiḥ ca iti
samena sama parivṛttiḥ yathā
sādhārasa mucaḥ vācaḥ dattvā kākati bhūbhuje

original: ato labhante kavayaḥ sahasraṃ gandhasindhurān // ViPrud_8.265 //
analyzed: atas labhante kavayaḥ sahasram gandha sindhurān
atra vacasām gandha sindhurāṇām ca sama tvam
nyūnena adhika parivṛttiḥ yathā
upāyanam gaja aśva ādi kṛtvā sarve bhūbhujaḥ
pratāparudra devasya labhante su sthirām kṛpām
atra tyajyamānāt upāyana ādeḥ ādīyamānasya pratāparudra kṛpā vilasitasya eva ādhikyam
adhikena nyūna parivṛttiḥ yathā
pratāparudreṇa raṇe jitāḥ pratyarthi bhūbhujaḥ

original: dattvā bhūṣāṃ kirātebhyo labhante valkalādikam // ViPrud_8.267 // atra
analyzed: dattvā bhūṣām kirātebhyaḥ labhante valkala ādikam atra
tyajyamānāt ābharaṇa jātāt ādīyamānasya valkala ādeḥ nyūna tvam
kāraṇa mālā alaṅkāraḥ
atha śṛṅkhalā nyāya mūla alaṅkārāḥ nirūpyante
pūrva pūrvam prati yadā hetuḥ syāt uttara uttaram
tadā kāraṇa mālā ākhyam alaṅkaraṇam ucyate

original: yadā pūrvapūrvaṃ krameṇottarottaraṃ prati hetutāṃ bhajate,
analyzed: yadā pūrva pūrvam krameṇa uttara uttaram prati hetutām bhajate
sa kāraṇa mālā ākhyaḥ laṅkāraḥ yathā
vidyayā vinaya utkarṣaḥ vinayena guṇa arjanam
guṇaiḥ prajā anurāgaḥ ca kramaḥ yam kākatīśvare
ekāvalī alaṅkāraḥ

original: yatrottarottareṣāṃ syāt pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati kramāt /
analyzed: yatra uttara uttareṣām syāt pūrvam pūrvam prati kramāt
viśeṣaṇa tva kathanam asau ekāvalī matā

original: yatra pūrvapūrvaṃ prati krameṇottarottaraṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhajate,
analyzed: yatra pūrva pūrvam prati krameṇa uttarottaram viśeṣaṇa tvam bhajate
saḥ ekāvalī alaṅkāraḥ
yathā
pratāparudra nagarī su janaiḥ upaśobhitā
su janāḥ sphīta vibhavaiḥ vibhavāḥ sthairya śālinaḥ
etat sthāpanena udāharaṇam
apohanena api bhavati yathā

original: na tadrājyaṃ prajā yatra na bhavantyūrjitaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: na tat rājyam prajāḥ yatra na bhavanti ūrjita śriyaḥ

original: na tāḥ prajāḥ prabhuryāsāṃ na svayaṃ kākatīśvaraḥ // ViPrud_8.272 //
analyzed: na tāḥ prajāḥ prabhuḥ yāsām na svayam kākatīśvaraḥ
mālā dīpaka alaṅkāraḥ
yadā tu pūrva pūrvasya saṃbhavet uttarottaram
pratyutkarṣa āvaha tvam tat mālādīpakam ucyate
yatra pūrva pūrvasya uttarottara guṇa āvaha tvam sa mālā dīpaka alaṅkāraḥ
yathā
bhāgya bhūmā mahīm prāptaḥ kākati indra bhujam mahī
bhujaḥ pratāpam atulam pratāpaḥ ca jagattrayam
uttarottaram utkarṣaḥ sāra alaṅkāraḥ ucyate
yathā
jagatsu vasudhā bhāti tasyām ekaśilā purī
kākatīya anvayaḥ tatra tasmin rudra nareśvaraḥ
sakala bhuvana sāra bhūtam pratāparudram viṣayīkurvataḥ cirāt asya alaṅkārasya sāraḥ iti anvartha abhidhānam
iti śrī vidyānātha kṛtau pratāparudrayaśobhūṣaṇe laṅkāra
śāstre rthālaṅkāra prakaraṇam samāptam
atha miśra alaṅkāra prakaraṇam
atha saṃsṛṣṭi saṃkarau nirūpyete

original: yathā laukikānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ hiraṇmayānāṃ maṇimayānāṃ ca pṛthak saundaryahetūnāmanyonyasaṃbandhena cārutvātiśayo dṛśyate ;
analyzed: yathā laukikānām alaṅkārāṇām hiraṇmayānām maṇi mayānām ca pṛthak saundarya hetūnām anyonya saṃbandhena cāru tva atiśayaḥ dṛśyate

original: tathaiva kāvyālaṅkārāṇāṃ rūpakādīnāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandhena saundaryātiśayaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: tathā eva kāvya alaṅkārāṇām rūpaka ādīnām mithas saṃbandhena saundarya atiśayaḥ pratīyate
sa ca saṃbandhaḥ dvividhaḥ saṃyoga rūpaḥ
samavāya rūpaḥ ca iti
saṃyoge miśra
tila taṇḍula nyāyaḥ
samavāye miśra
kṣīra nīra nyāyaḥ
tila taṇḍula nyāyena saṃbandhe saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
kṣīra nīra nyāyena saṃbandhe saṃkaraḥ
anayoḥ pṛthak cāru tva atiśaya hetutvāt alaṅkāra dhurandhara tvam
na tu pūrva ukta alaṅkāra śeṣa tā
saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
tatra prathamam saṃsṛṣṭiḥ nigadyate
tila taṇḍula saṃśleṣa nyāyāt yatra parasparam
saṃśliṣyeyuḥ alaṅkārāḥ sā saṃsṛṣṭiḥ nigadyate

original: yatra tilataṇḍulanyāyena parasparasaṃbaddhā rūpakādayo bhavanti sā saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: yatra tila taṇḍula nyāyena paraspara saṃbaddhāḥ rūpaka ādayaḥ bhavanti sā saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
sā trividhā śabda alaṅkāra gata tvena
artha alaṅkāra gata tvena
ubhaya alaṅkāra gata tvena ca
śabda alaṅkāra saṃsṛṣṭiḥ yathā
śumbhat saṃbhrama gandha sindhura dhurā nirdārita urvī talā
stu aṅgat tuṅga turaṅgama pratibhayāḥ drāk syandana syandanāḥ
tīvra ārambha samudyat udbhaṭa bhaṭa āṭopa sphurat diś taṭā
niḥ sīmāḥ prasaranti rudra nṛpateḥ jaitra prayāṇa udyamāḥ
atra cheka anuprāsa vṛtti anuprāsayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
artha alaṅkāra saṃsṛṣṭiḥ yathā
kākati indra camūḥ dhatte mahimānam udanvataḥ
grasate yā dviṣat bhūpa dhvajinīḥ taṭinīḥ iva
atra nidarśana upamāyoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
ubhaya saṃsṛṣṭiḥ yathā
dṛśyate samare vīraiḥ utphaṇaḥ phaṇavān iva
atra vṛtti anuprāsa upamāyoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
atha saṅkaraḥ nirūpyate
kṣīra nīra nayāt yatra saṃbandhaḥ syāt parasparam
alaṅkṛtīnām etāsām saṅkaraḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: yatra kṣīranīranyāyenālaṅkārāṇāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandho bhavati sa saṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: yatra kṣīra nīra nyāyena alaṅkārāṇām mithas saṃbandhaḥ bhavati sa saṅkaraḥ
tasya aṅga aṅgi bhāvena eka vācaka anupraveśena saṃdehena ca traividhyam
tatra aṅga aṅgi bhāva saṅkaraḥ yathā
udyat bṛṃhita garjitaiḥ dvipa ghaṭā kādambinī saṃbhramaiḥ
kṣoṇībhṛt kaṭaka uparodha paṭubhiḥ prāvṛḍvihārāḥ iva
yātrāḥ kākati vallabhasya jagatām ānandam ātanvate

original: atra yātrāḥ prāvṛḍvihārā ivetyupamālaṅkāreṇa dvipaghaṭākādambinītyatropamā prasādhyata iti sajātīyayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ ;
analyzed: atra yātrāḥ prāvṛṣ vihārāḥ iva iti upamā alaṅkāreṇa dvipa ghaṭā kādambinī iti atra upamā prasādhyate iti sajātīyayoḥ aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ
kādambinī iva dvipa ghaṭā iti samāsa āśrayaṇāt
kṣoṇībhṛt kaṭaka uparodha iti atra
vijātīya saṅkaraḥ yathā
pratāparudrasya kṛpāṇa dhārā pratyarthi phāleṣu patati amandam

original: prakṣālanāyeva kṛtasya dhātrā tadvartino durlipikalmaṣasya // ViPrud_9.7 //
analyzed: prakṣālanāya iva kṛtasya dhātrā tad vartinaḥ durlipi kalmaṣasya

original: atra prakṣālanāyevetyutprekṣayā durlipikalmaṣasyetyatra rūpakaṃ prasādhyata iti vijātīyayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atra prakṣālanāya iva iti utprekṣayā durlipi kalmaṣasya iti atra rūpakam prasādhyate iti vijātīyayoḥ aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ
ekavācaka anupraviṣṭa saṅkaraḥ yathā
vijita ari puraḥ mūrtau vilasat sarva maṅgalaḥ
bhuvi śaṃbhuḥ iva ābhāti kākatīya nareśvaraḥ
atra vijita ari puraḥ iti artha sāmyāt upamā
vilasat sarva maṅgalaḥ iti śabda sāmyāt śleṣaḥ ca śambhuḥ iva iti ekasmin iva śabde nupraviṣṭau
saṃdeha saṅkaraḥ yathā
jātaḥ pratāpa rudra induḥ kākatīya anvaya ambudhau
dhatte jana cakorāṇām prasāda jyotsnayā amṛtam
atra kākatīya kula ambudhau ityādau rūpaka upamāyoḥ saṃdeha saṅkaraḥ
kākatīya anvayaḥ eva ambudhiḥ
kākatīya anvayaḥ mbudhiḥ iva iti samāsa dvaya saṃbhavāt

original: na cātra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā pramāṇamanyatarasyāstīti saṃdeha eva paryavasyati /
analyzed: na ca atra sādhakam bādhakam vā pramāṇam anyatarasya asti iti saṃdehaḥ eva paryavasyati
sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa saṃbhave tu saṃdeha nivṛttiḥ
atra sādhakam yathā
pratāparudra nṛpateḥ pārijātāt samudbhavāḥ
vataṃsayanti diś nāryaḥ madhurāḥ kīrtti mañjarīḥ

original: atra kīrttaya eva mañjarya iti rūpakālaṅkāre vataṃsayantīti sādhakaṃ pramāṇam/
analyzed: atra kīrttayaḥ eva mañjaryaḥ iti rūpaka alaṅkāre vataṃsayanti iti sādhakam pramāṇam
bādhakam yathā
kākati indrasya niḥ sāṇa dhvanau dikṣu vijṛmbhite
vyākula kṛta sattvaḥ bhūt pratipakṣa bala arṇavaḥ

original: atra pratipakṣabalārṇava ityupamāyā vyākulīkṛtasattva iti bādhakaṃ pramāṇam ;
analyzed: atra pratipakṣa bala arṇavaḥ iti upamāyāḥ vyākulīkṛta sattvaḥ iti bādhakam pramāṇam
upamitam vyāghra ādibhiḥ sāmānya a prayoge
iti anuśāsanena sāmānya prayogasya upamā bādhaka tvāt
atas pāriśeṣyāt rūpaka alaṅkāraḥ

original: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamanyeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau boddhavyau tatra tatra prabandheṣu //
analyzed: evam yathāsaṃbhavam anyeṣām alaṅkārāṇām saṃsṛṣṭi saṅkarau boddhavyau tatra tatra prabandheṣu
iti śrī vidyānātha mahā upādhyāya kṛtau pratāparudrayaśobhūṣaṇe laṅkāra
śāstre miśra alaṅkāra prakaraṇam samāptam
pritāparudrīyam
nāma alaṅkāra śāstram samāptam
